jobs.title: Automation Engineer Needed: Expertise in n8n, Make.com, and VAPI
jobs.shortDescription:
Summary
Automation Agency ‚Äì Long-Term Partnership
Project Type: Ongoing Contract (Long-Term Engagement)
Experience Level: Expert / Agency Preferred
Compensation: Per-Project Basis (Negotiated Each Time)
Availability: High / Consistent Communication Required
Client: Silimind LLC ‚Äì AI Consulting & Automation Division

About Silimind
Silimind LLC is an AI consulting and automation company specializing in building intelligent business systems, data-driven workflows, and AI-integrated software. We partner with organizations across multiple industries to deploy scale-able automation solutions that reduce manual work and improve operational efficiency.

Role Overview
We are seeking a long-term Automation Expert to collaborate on internal automatons. The agency or expert will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality automation systems using AI, APIs, and no-code/low-code tools, principally an inbound call routing chat-bot. We are also seeking to extend the same bot to handle quires on our website.

This is a recurring partnership ‚Äî projects will be assigned continuously based on capability, performance, and responsiveness.

Responsibilities
- Design and build business automation workflows (CRM, lead management, analytics, marketing, support).
- Integrate AI tools and APIs into automation pipelines. USE JIRA AND BE COMFORTABLE WITH REPORTING DAILY.
- Maintain, test, and document automatons for stability and scalability.
- Collaborate with and advise Silimind‚Äôs Data & Automation Manager for project planning and delivery.
- Deliver clear workflow documentation and short Loom or screen recordings explaining setup.

Ensure timely completion and proactive communication during each project.

Requirements
- Proven experience with automation tools such as Make (Integromat), n8n.
- Strong knowledge of API integrations, webhooks, and JSON data handling.
- Ability to create scale-able workflows that can handle multi-system connections.
- Clear documentation and communication skills.
- High responsiveness and reliability for ongoing collaboration. Via Discord and Jira
- Experience working as or within an agency team preferred.

Preferred Skills
- Familiarity with AI integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, or other model APIs).
- Experience building reusable automation templates or white-label workflows.
- Understanding of CRM systems (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.).
- Capability to manage multiple active projects simultaneously.

Engagement Terms
- Long-term, ongoing contract.
- Compensation is per project, negotiated before each assignment.
- Workload based on availability and performance consistency.
- Collaboration tools: Jira, Discord, Google Drive, Loom.

Deliverables
Develop internal call routing AI.
Develop chat-bot on our website to handle customer quires. 
Provide regular updates and progress reports.

jobs.title: AI/Enrichment Specialist for Data Optimization
jobs.shortDescription: We are seeking an experienced AI/Enrichment Specialist to enhance our data processes. The ideal candidate will perform bulk enrichment using AI, title classification, tagging, research automation, data cleansing, crafting dynamic personalization variables, as well as AI-powered scraping or "agent" tasks.  We require someone who can streamline our data workflows and improve the quality of our datasets. If you have a strong background in data enrichment and automation techniques, we would love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Automation & CRM Tech VA Needed (Airtable + Zapier + MailerLite Integration)

our Responsibilities Will Include:

MailerLite forms

Airtable databases

Zapier automation

SMS notifications (TextMagic/Twilio)

bullet-point SOP

troubleshooting notes

update instructions

think in systems

understand parent/athlete segmentation

work independently

Name

Email

Tag (single select)

Add static tag = ‚ÄúTest Lead‚Äù

Send notification email to provided test email

Explain:

the logic

how it works

how you tested it

how you would scale it

how you would improve reliability

Provide a written 5‚Äì10 bullet SOP.

This shows:

your logic

your technical skill

your communication

your ability to follow directions

how you handle errors

your speed

your attention to detail

Must have ALL:

Zapier (or Make) advanced workflows

parent communication

jobs.title: Amazon PPC Automation Software SaaS (Seller Central API + AI + Auto-Bidding Engine)
jobs.shortDescription:
We are looking for a highly experienced developer or team to build a full Amazon PPC Automation SaaS platform.

The software must connect directly to Amazon Seller Central via the Advertising API, pull all relevant PPC data in real time, and use AI/ML analysis + rule-based algorithms to fully automate all PPC campaign optimizations.

The system should intelligently:

Adjust bids automatically (up/down)

Identify profitable vs. wasteful keywords

Add new keywords from auto campaigns

Generate and apply negative keywords

Optimize budgets, placements, and match types

Move keywords from auto ‚Üí manual campaigns

Predict performance and scale winning campaigns

Reduce wasted ad spend and improve ROAS/ACOS


The goal: A fully automated Amazon PPC engine that outperforms manual PPC management.


---

Required Skills (MUST-HAVES)

Only apply if you have strong experience with ALL of the following:

‚úÖ 1. Amazon Advertising API (Latest Version)

Experience with Login with Amazon (LwA) authentication

Reading and writing campaigns, ad groups, keywords

Pulling reports (Search Terms, Campaigns, Keywords, Placements, etc.)

Creating and managing Sponsored Products, SB, SD campaigns


‚úÖ 2. Deep Knowledge of Amazon PPC

Auto vs Manual campaign strategies

Broad / Phrase / Exact match logic

Keyword harvesting

Optimal bidding structures

Negative keyword strategies

Placement bid multipliers

Overspend protection techniques


‚úÖ 3. AI / Machine Learning

We want the system to automatically analyze:

Keyword performance: ACOS, ROAS, CTR, CVR

Profitability and wasted spend

Bid change recommendations

Budget allocation across campaigns

Detection of burn keywords

Prediction of keyword performance trends


AI goals:

Reduce ACOS

Increase ROAS

Scale profitable keywords

Reduce wasted ad spend


‚úÖ 4. SaaS Platform Development

Backend (Node.js, Python, or Go)

Frontend (React, Vue, or Angular)

Multi-user architecture with subscription billing

Admin dashboard and user dashboards

Cloud infrastructure (AWS preferred)

Secure API token storage



---

Core Features ‚Äì Phase 1

1. Amazon API real-time data integration


2. AI keyword & bid performance analysis


3. Automatic bid algorithm


4. Automatic negative keyword engine


5. Keyword harvesting (Auto ‚Üí Manual)


6. Smart daily optimizations


7. Budget & bidding automation


8. User dashboard with key metrics




---

Phase 2 (optional later)

Multi-marketplace support (US/DE/UK/EU etc.)

Profit dashboard with COGS import

AI-based keyword discovery

Campaign builder for SP/SB/SD

API integrations (Shopify, WooCommerce, JTL, etc.)



---

What We Provide

Access to multiple Amazon Seller Accounts for testing

Clear workflows and PPC strategy logic

Long-term opportunity and continuous expansion

A real project with real scaling potential



---

Expectations

Only serious senior-level developers

Must show past projects with Amazon API and SaaS

Provide architecture suggestion + timeline + cost estimate

Strong communication and clean documentation

Ability to manage ongoing improvements

jobs.title: Develop AI-Powered Speech-to-Text Meditation Avatar Web App
jobs.shortDescription: We are seeking a talented developer to create a web application featuring an AI-driven speech-to-text meditation avatar. This innovative app will utilize advanced AI technology to enable users to meditate with a virtual guide that remembers their preferences and progress over time. Ideal candidates should have experience in web development, AI integration, and user experience design. The project aims to enhance mindfulness practices through interactive technology.
jobs.fullDescription: SummaryWe are seeking a talented developer to create a web application featuring an AI-driven speech-to-text meditation avatar. This innovative app will utilize advanced AI technology to enable users to meditate with a virtual guide that remembers their preferences and progress over time. Ideal candidates should have experience in web development, AI integration, and user experience design. The project aims to enhance mindfulness practices through interactive technology.

jobs.title: Sales Rep / SDR for SaaS (Email Marketing Platform) ‚Äî Warm Leads + Product Demos + Light Onboarding
jobs.shortDescription:
We‚Äôre looking for a sharp, reliable sales rep to handle inbound sales calls and demos for our SaaS platform, Hoppy Copy ‚Äî an AI-powered email marketing platform used by consultants, coaches, service-based businesses, and small teams.

This role is NOT cold outreach. You‚Äôll be speaking with prospects who already booked a call or requested a demo.

What You‚Äôll Be Doing

1. Take inbound sales calls & demos

Run 15‚Äì30 minute product demos using our framework

Learn the platform well enough to guide prospects to the right plan

Ask the right questions to understand their business, pain points, and use-case

2. Convert qualified prospects to paid customers

Confidently recommend the correct plan (Starter, Grow, or higher-tier, and add-ons)

Address objections clearly without overselling

Follow up via email/text if needed

Track conversions and notes inside our CRM

3. Assist with basic onboarding for new customers

Help them set up their first newsletter engine

Add their content sources (website URLs, blogs, feeds, etc.)

Guide them through generating their first automated newsletter

Help set up prompts, idea feeds, and brand memory items (we‚Äôll train you)

No technical background required ‚Äî just logical thinking and attention to detail.

--Who We‚Äôre Looking For--

Strong communicator who is comfortable on Google Meet and can run a crisp demo

Experience in SaaS sales, preferably with SMBs or service-based businesses

Fast learner ‚Äî our platform is not complicated, but you must get the value proposition quickly

Reliable and organized ‚Äî able to follow up, take notes, and track activity

Good judgment ‚Äî able to qualify leads and guide them to the right tier

Bonus: Experience with email marketing, newsletters, or ESPs

Bonus: Understanding of AI tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, etc.)

We‚Äôre not looking for:

Cold callers
Spammers
Script-readers who can‚Äôt hold a real conversation
Anyone juggling 10 jobs and disappearing mid-project

--Hours & Availability--

Mostly flexible
Must be available for calls during North American business hours (PST‚ÄìEST overlap)
Expect 5‚Äì20 calls per week depending on volume

--Compensation--

Per call rate + performance bonuses for each converted customer. We‚Äôre open to discussing a structure depending on experience.

--How to Apply--

Send a short message including:

A quick summary of your SaaS or sales experience

A 20‚Äì30 second Loom or audio clip introducing yourself (optional but highly preferred)

Your availability in PST

Your expected hourly rate + bonus expectations

jobs.title: Customer Support & Success
jobs.shortDescription:
Hey! 

We're Hoppy Copy, an AI email marketing company (hoppycopy.co) that automates newsletter content and publishing for clients. We're looking for an experienced Customer Support / Success specialist to manage customer communications with our awesome customers as well as help our customers with their email marketing.

Ideally you have the following:

- previous experience in customer support roles for SaaS companies
- experience with email marketing and content creation
- experience using email marketing tools (i.e. mailchimp, convertkit, beehiiv)
- perfectly fluent in English

In this role, your ultimate goal is to help our customers and prospects be successful. You will responsible for all our customer communications, building strong relationships with customers, keeping support documentation up-to-date, publishing their newsletters, and client reporting.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

jobs.title: AI Automation Setup Specialist (Freelancer)
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
I run a business helping small businesses automate repetitive admin tasks using AI and workflow automation tools. I‚Äôm looking for a freelance automation specialist to implement workflow automations based on detailed blueprints I provide.

You will NOT speak to clients ‚Äî this is purely backend implementation.

Responsibilities:
	‚Ä¢	Build automations exactly as described in my blueprint, including:
	‚Ä¢	Lead capture ‚Üí CRM ‚Üí automated follow-up
	‚Ä¢	Appointment booking + reminders
	‚Ä¢	Customer communication flows
	‚Ä¢	Invoice & payment automation
	‚Ä¢	Spreadsheet/database updates
	‚Ä¢	Dashboards and reporting (if included in blueprint)
	‚Ä¢	Test all workflows to ensure everything works end-to-end
	‚Ä¢	Document workflows in simple step-by-step instructions (SOP)
	‚Ä¢	Optionally, record short Loom walkthrough videos for internal use

Requirements:

jobs.title: GoHighLevel Automation & Tech Setup Expert for Info-Business Funnels (Long-Term | Fixed or Hourly)
jobs.shortDescription:
JOB DESCRIPTION:
I‚Äôm looking for a high-level GoHighLevel automation & tech specialist for long-term collaboration across two brands (construction + online education).
This is not a basic funnel builder role ‚Äî I need someone who understands full funnel operations, attribution tracking, automations, call tracking, and technical setup at a professional level.

If you are not highly experienced with GoHighLevel at a deep automation/tech level ‚Äî please do not apply.

About the Brands
‚Ä¢ Craftex ‚Äî 7-figure construction & design company in the UK
‚Ä¢ BizMentor ‚Äî online education + high-ticket mentorship brand

We run VSL funnels, booking funnels, SMS/email automations, retargeting flows, outbound setters, and paid ads.
I need someone who can own the entire technical side.

Current Priority Tasks (THIS is what you will do first):

Facebook Ads ‚Üí Funnel Attribution Setup
I need analytics showing, for each separate video ad:
‚Äì how many leads came from each video
‚Äì how many calls were booked
‚Äì how many calls were attended
‚Äì how many sales were closed
Metrics required:
‚Äì Cost per Lead
‚Äì Cost per Booked Qualified Call
‚Äì Cost per Call Attended
‚Äì Cost per Sale

WA Bot Setup
‚Äì Build a WA follow-up bot to book strategy sessions after a lead opts in.

Fix Email Deliverability
‚Äì Emails currently land in Promotions.
‚Äì I need the technical setup fixed (warmup, authentication, routing, etc.).

Outbound Setter Call Tracking System
Set up proper tracking inside GHL for:
‚Äì Calls dialed
‚Äì Calls answered
‚Äì Time on the phone
‚Äì Calls set for a Discovery Session
‚Äì Calls that showed up
‚Äì Calls closed (paid in full, deposit, declined)

Voice AI Immediate Lead Call
‚Äì Set up and test Voice AI calling leads immediately.
‚Äì Advise if GoHighLevel‚Äôs current AI is good enough or if we need an external solution.

After these tasks
This is a long-term position.
Your ongoing responsibilities will include:
‚Äì Maintaining all funnels and automations
‚Äì Fixing bugs, logic issues, tagging, routing
‚Äì Improving conversion rates across steps
‚Äì Improving email deliverability
‚Äì Building additional funnels when needed
‚Äì Ensuring everything runs smoothly daily
‚Äì Full system oversight for both brands

This is NOT a one-time project.

Requirements
(short, strict, high-level ‚Äî only professionals will apply)

‚Ä¢ Expert-level GoHighLevel automation & technical setup experience
‚Ä¢ Understanding of info-business funnels (VSL ‚Üí nurture ‚Üí book call ‚Üí show up ‚Üí close)
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of tracking, attribution, Zapier integrations, logic, tags
‚Ä¢ Experience with WhatsApp automation
‚Ä¢ Strong English
‚Ä¢ Long-term mindset & reliability

How to Apply

Start your proposal with your hourly rate or monthly rate.
To apply, please include:
- A short Loom video (2‚Äì5 minutes) where you walk through your relevant experience with similar tasks ‚Äî funnel setup, automations, tracking, WhatsApp flows, email deliverability, booking/show-up systems, etc. You can use examples you already have, demo accounts, or blurred client data. The goal is simply to understand your real experience and how you solve similar problems.
- A brief written summary of your experience with info-business / high-ticket mentorship funnels.
- Your weekly availability and when you can start.
- Confirmation that you can handle the tasks listed in the job description.

jobs.title: Automate Daily Construction Site Reports Using OpenAI Vision and cPanel Images
jobs.shortDescription: We already have thousands of construction-site images automatically uploaded into cPanel each day. We need a developer to build a lightweight script that samples these images, sends them to the OpenAI Vision API, and generates a daily productivity report + JSON summary (deliveries, subcontractor presence, worker counts, equipment activity). The script should save the report and email it automatically via a cron job. No heavy machine learning models required ‚Äî just smart automation around our existing image flow.

The script should save the report and email it automatically via a cron job. No heavy machine learning models required ‚Äî just smart automation around our existing image flow.

jobs.title: N8N expert to build workflows
jobs.shortDescription:
Hello.

Looking for a skilled N8N automation specialist. Quote me a fixed price that include revisions to make sure workflow is functioning correctly. The flow is in article writing and wordpress uploading.

This is the first build

Build a workflow in n8n for article production where Claude writes articles that are then uploaded to WordPress as drafts


Step 1 - Upload Content Briefs:

I upload 1-30 text files containing content briefs for articles to Google Drive

Content briefs contain all necessary instructions for writing the articles

No additional instructions are needed beyond what's in the briefs

Step 2 - Detection:

System detects when new briefs have been uploaded

Step 3 - Reading Briefs:

System reads the briefs

Step 4 - Writing Articles:

Articles are written by Claude AI
Writing instructions for Claude will be uploaded and ready to use - instructions are lengthy

Step 5 - Save to Google Drive:

When Claude has finished writing according to the instructions and content brief, the article is uploaded to a separate folder in Google Drive

Step 6 - Manual Editing:

User edits the finished text

Step 7 - WordPress Upload:

After editing is complete, the article is uploaded to WordPress with the same formatting
Article is set as draft status - use pages, NOT posts

Workflow Complete

jobs.title: Experienced Video Editor for Dark Psychology Explainer Content
jobs.shortDescription:
Hi there!

We are a YouTube Automation team building a new channel focused on evidence-based dark psychology explainer content. We are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced Video Editor to join our team.

Our channel explores shocking truths about human behavior, power, and manipulation, always backed by real studies and research. The tone is calm, analytical, and intelligent.
In terms of visual quality and style, we are heavily inspired by The Paint Explainer (https://www.youtube.com/@ThePaintExplainer). 
We aim for minimalist, illustration-based, colored motion graphics (No 2D-Animation).

What we‚Äôre looking for:
‚Ä¢ You have proven experience in editing explainer videos for YouTube and hence, a good understanding of copyright & fair use (music, images, research screenshots, etc.)
‚Ä¢ You understand pacing, retention, and storytelling through visuals, with great cuts and fresh visual beats 
‚Ä¢ You are skilled in creating minimalist motion graphics and "Still-Image Animation" (digital graphic movement, tweening) ‚Äì not full 2D animation.
‚Ä¢ You can work consistently and reliably ( ~2 videos per week) and meet agreed deadlines.
‚Ä¢ Creativity, attention to detail, and consistency.

What we offer:
‚Ä¢ Long-term collaboration (we are looking for a dedicated editor, not just a one-time assignment).
‚Ä¢ A steady stream of projects (approx. 2 videos per week).
‚Ä¢ Exceptional Scripts are provided.
‚Ä¢ Fair, project-based compensation and reliable payment.
‚Ä¢ Onboarding-Session, Clear guidelines , structured editor briefings and friendly, pleasant communication.
‚Ä¢ The chance to become part of a growing, passionate team

How to apply?
Please send us:
‚Ä¢ Your portfolio / sample videos (especially explainer videos or similar motion graphics styles).
‚Ä¢ A short note about your experience with YouTube videos, explainer content, or dark/psychology-related topics.
‚Ä¢ Why you'd be a great fit for this cooperation?

Please do not apply if you do not have profound experience in YouTube video editing.
If you have a passion for visual storytelling and experience in editing YouTube explainer content, we would love to hear from you!

All the best, 
Sandra

jobs.title: Part-time ecommerce bookkeeper/executive assistant
jobs.shortDescription:
COMPANY BACKGROUND

We are a small but tight-knit team running ecommerce operations for large brands in the US. Mutual trust and hard work are the foundation of everything we do. We take very good care of our team, provided they take very good care of our parent company.

ROLE BACKGROUND

This role is some mixture of bookkeeping and general finance work. You will operate effectively as an executive assistant with a specialization in financial tasks. As your hiring manager, I will personally mentor you and provide all I can to help you succeed. A big focus of mine is to use AI and AI agents to automate our workflows, and I will focus on mentoring you to develop these skills as well if you don't already have experience here.

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE

Non-Negotiables:
   - Reliability & consistency - Meets deadlines, communicates proactively, shows up consistently
   - Strong work ethic - Takes initiative, follows through on tasks, doesn't need constant oversight
   - Genuine interest in bookkeeping/finance work - Enjoys the detail-oriented nature of the work rather than viewing it as drudgery
   - Moderate bookkeeping experience - 1-3 years doing practical bookkeeping work (doesn't need to be ecommerce-specific)
   - QuickBooks Online working knowledge - Comfortable with basic functions;

Important but Teachable:
   - Excel/Google Sheets competency - Basic formulas and data organization (Jeremiah can teach advanced techniques)
   - Ability to learn new platforms - Willing to navigate unfamiliar software to pull reports
   - Clear communication - Asks questions when stuck, provides status updates

Nice-to-Haves:
   - Ecommerce bookkeeping background
   - Previous executive/virtual assistant experience
   - Familiarity with invoicing workflows

WORKLOAD OVERVIEW

Core Bookkeeping (60-70% of time)
   - Transaction entry and categorization in QBO under Jeremiah's direction
   - Bank/credit card reconciliations
   - Data entry and cleanup tasks
   - Assisting with month-end close procedures that have been established

Administrative Finance Tasks (30-40% of time)
   - Pulling reports from ecommerce platforms
   - Creating invoices following company templates/instructions
   - Organizing financial documents and records
   - Ad hoc tasks like vendor follow-up, data compilation, or research

OTHER NOTES

Controller support: Our team will provide controller support for strategic decisions, complex accounting treatments, system setup, and quality control. This role will execute the recurring tasks reliably and bring questions to the Controller.

Estimated Weekly Hours: ~15-20 hours with opportunities to expand.

jobs.title: N8N Specialist Needed for Multi-Tenant RAG and Document Management
jobs.shortDescription:
Project Goal:
Develop robust N8N workflows for a multi-tenant RAG chatbot backend, handling the complete lifecycle of documents: secure upload, indexing, and crucial deletion/de-indexing. The RAG process must intelligently select documents from both a private customer repository and a shared central repository.

Required Expertise:
‚Ä¢	Essential: n8n Workflow Automation (Webhook, HTTP Request, Function/Code nodes).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture (chunking, embedding, indexing).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Advanced experience with Vector Database APIs (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant) and implementing metadata filtering for multi-tenancy and vector deletion by metadata/ID.
‚Ä¢	Strong Plus: Experience with Agentic AI systems (designing LLM calls that return structured decisions/tags).
‚Ä¢	Familiarity: Integration with major LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, etc.).

Part 1: Document Lifecycle Management Workflows (
The consultant must build two separate N8N workflows for managing document data: Ingestion and Deletion.
1a. Document Ingestion Workflow (Upload & Indexing)
‚Ä¢	Secure Upload Endpoint: Create an N8N Webhook to securely receive file uploads (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT) along with the associated customer_id and a unique document_id.
‚Ä¢	Indexing Workflow:
1.	Associate the file with the customer_id and document_id.
2.	Chunk the document content.
3.	Generate embeddings for each chunk.
4.	Store the chunks and their embeddings in the Vector Database, ensuring that both the customer_id and the document_id are included as metadata for every stored vector.
1b. Document Deletion Workflow (De-indexing)
‚Ä¢	Deletion Endpoint: Create a separate N8N Webhook to receive a request containing the customer_id and the document_id of the file to be removed.
‚Ä¢	De-indexing Workflow:
1.	Use the customer_id and document_id to make an API call to the Vector Database.
2.	Crucially, use metadata filtering to delete all vectors associated with that specific document_id and customer_id combination from the index.
3.	Send a success confirmation.

Part 2: Agentic RAG Orchestration Workflow 
This workflow handles the live querying and response generation:
1.	Receive Query Request: Triggered by a Webhook receiving the customer_id and user_query.
2.	AI Agent Decision: Send the user_query to an external AI Agent/LLM service. The Agent must analyze the request and return a structured JSON response identifying the necessary document tags.
3.	Dynamic RAG Orchestration:
o	Execute parallel HTTP Requests to the Vector Database(s).
o	Private RAG: Query the customer's dedicated data, using metadata filtering to filter by the received customer_id AND the private_tags.
o	Shared RAG: Query the central repository, filtering only by the shared_tags.
4.	Final Generation: Merge the retrieved text chunks and use the combined context to generate the final response via an LLM API call.
5.	Return Response: Respond to the original Webhook request with the final generated text.

Deliverables:
1.	A fully functional Document Ingestion N8N Workflow (JSON export).
2.	A fully functional Document Deletion N8N Workflow (JSON export) that successfully removes vectors based on document_id and customer_id.
3.	A fully functional Agentic RAG Orchestration N8N Workflow (JSON export).
4.	Detailed Documentation on workflow logic, API connections, and schema requirements.
5.	A clear demonstration that the RAG workflow only retrieves private documents linked to the correct customer_id and that deleted documents are immediately excluded from retrieval.

jobs.title: N8N/Zapier/Make expert needed
jobs.shortDescription:
We are seeking an experienced AI Automation Engineer to build and maintain an intelligent automation system for our business. This system will use AI agents, workflow automation tools, and API integrations to streamline internal processes, reduce manual work, and improve operational efficiency.

Position Overview

The engineer will be responsible for creating an AI-driven system that can understand business inputs, make decisions, and automatically trigger operational workflows. The solution must be reliable, scalable, and fully integrated with our existing tools.

Key Responsibilities
AI Agent Development

Build an AI agent capable of interpreting incoming data (text, forms, messages).

Use LLMs (OpenAI/Claude/etc.) to classify intents and generate structured actions.

Create rule-based and AI-based decision logic for various business scenarios.

Workflow Automation

Develop operational workflows using Make.com or n8n.

Automations may include:

Lead processing & CRM updates

Customer onboarding workflows

Task creation & internal notifications

Email/SMS/WhatsApp sequences

Data routing & classification

Ensure workflows are optimized, stable, and maintainable.

API & Tool Integrations

Connect AI agents with third-party and internal systems.

Integrations may include:

Airtable, Notion, Google Sheets

Gmail / Outlook

Slack / Teams

Twilio / WhatsApp

Custom API endpoints

Handle authentication, error-handling, and data formatting.

Testing, Monitoring & Documentation

Perform end-to-end testing with real business scenarios.

Monitor automation performance and implement fail-safes.

Document workflows, logic, and update procedures for internal teams.

Requirements

Strong experience with Make.com, n8n, or Zapier

Proven ability to build AI-powered workflows

Familiarity with OpenAI/LLM prompt engineering

Solid understanding of REST APIs, JSON, and webhooks

Strong debugging and problem-solving skills

Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions

Preferred Qualifications

Experience building AI Agents for operations or customer workflows

Experience with CRM automation (Airtable / HubSpot / Notion)

Ability to design scalable system architecture

About the Role

This position is focused on creating a real production automation system for our business. The AI agent and workflows will be used daily by our team, so reliability, clarity, and scalability are essential.

jobs.title: Marketing & Automation Manager (MUST Have Real Estate + GHL Experience) ‚Äì Long-Term Role
jobs.shortDescription:
I am hiring a long-term marketing and automation specialist who MUST have experience in the Real Estate industry and MUST be an expert in Go High Level (GHL).

You will manage daily and weekly marketing operations for three companies:

Mortgage lender

Real estate brokerage

Escrow company

This role requires someone who can produce multiple campaigns per week ‚Äî and campaigns must be strategic, effective, and built to generate real results, not just templates.

Responsibilities
Daily Tasks

Create and schedule social media posts for all 3 brands (using brand colors + guidelines)

Manage and update Go High Level workflows

Publish content across Instagram, Facebook, and LinkedIn

Maintain daily marketing tasks and communication

Weekly Tasks

Create multiple campaigns per week (email + SMS + funnels)

Build high-converting landing pages inside GHL

Create lead nurturing workflows

Create realtor recruiting & loan officer recruiting campaigns

Build escrow-focused campaigns for realtor attraction

Set up, manage, and optimize AI agents inside GHL (buyer, seller, realtor, escrow AI)

Maintain content calendars

Develop brand-consistent assets and templates

Required Skills (Must-Have)

‚úî Real Estate industry experience (required)
‚úî Advanced Go High Level (GHL) expertise (required)
‚úî Ability to create multiple effective campaigns every week
‚úî Mortgage marketing experience (preferred)
‚úî Escrow marketing experience (major plus)
‚úî Social media content creation & branding
‚úî Email + SMS marketing
‚úî Funnel building in GHL
‚úî Workflow & automation optimization
‚úî Basic design skills (Canva or similar)
‚úî Experience with AI agents inside GHL (preferred)
‚úî Strong communication & ability to deliver weekly deadlines

Hours & Commitment

15 hours per week

Long-term ongoing role

Must manage work across all 3 companies

Must deliver consistent weekly output with measurable results

To Apply, Please Submit:

Examples of successful GHL workflows, campaigns, or funnels

Samples of social media content you created

Details about your Real Estate industry experience

Examples of campaigns you built that produced results

Your weekly availability

jobs.title: n8n Automation Expert for YouTube Split Testing & Multi-Platform Posting
jobs.shortDescription:
n8n Automation Expert Needed for YouTube Split Testing and Multi-Platform Video Distribution System

I need an experienced n8n automation developer to build a complete content publishing system for my real estate media channel. I produce both YouTube long-form videos and high-volume short-form content. I need an automated workflow that handles posting, scheduling, and metadata across multiple platforms.

This project requires advanced automation, API experience, and production-grade workflow design.

Project Overview

n8n should automatically process long-form YouTube videos, run YouTube split testing, and distribute short-form videos to multiple social platforms. All content will be placed into Google Drive using a structured naming convention.

The system must support two modes for titles. If I provide title options, use them. If titles are blank, OpenAI should generate three title options and a recommended best title.

Requirements
1. Long-Form YouTube Automation

Monitor Google Drive for new long-form video files

Parse filenames including month, week, topic, funnel level, and type

Read and update metadata in Google Sheets

Use my title options or generate titles with OpenAI if none are provided

Generate SEO descriptions and tags with OpenAI

Upload videos to YouTube as private and schedule publishing

Upload three thumbnails

Set up YouTube Test and Compare split testing using three titles and three thumbnails

Write back YouTube video ID and URL to Google Sheets

2. Short-Form Multi-Platform Posting

Monitor Google Drive for new short-form files

Parse filename using the same naming rules

Generate platform-specific captions with OpenAI

Upload short-form videos to:

YouTube Shorts

Instagram Reels through Meta Graph API

Facebook Business Page

TikTok using supported upload method

LinkedIn Video

Write all post URLs and IDs to Google Sheets

Update status fields

3. Optional Thumbnail Rotation

Rotate YouTube thumbnails daily for published long-form videos

Update Google Sheets with current thumbnail

Log changes

Naming Convention

All files follow this pattern:

mX_wkY_vidZ-topic-funnel-type.ext

Examples:
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-LONG.mp4
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-thumbA.jpg
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-SHORT1.mp4

Workflows must parse all values from the filename.

Technical Skills Needed

Advanced n8n development

Google Drive and Google Sheets automation

YouTube Data API including uploading, scheduling, thumbnails, and split testing

Meta Graph API for Instagram Reels and Facebook Page posts

TikTok upload integrations

LinkedIn video posting

OpenAI for metadata and caption generation

Error handling, retry logic, and workflow logging

Deliverables

Fully built workflows including:

Drive to Sheets intake

Long-form YouTube upload and split testing

Short-form multi-platform posting

Optional thumbnail rotation

All API connections configured and tested

Reliable read and write operations to Google Sheets

Documentation for setup and maintenance

Optional brief walkthrough video

How to Apply

Please provide:

Examples of advanced n8n workflows you have built

Experience with YouTube API

Experience with Meta Graph API or TikTok uploads

Confirmation you can build YouTube split testing

Your estimated timeline

jobs.title: Lead Generation & Sales Operations Specialist (HubSpot API + Orum)
jobs.shortDescription:
We're looking for a scrappy, technical lead generation specialist to fuel a high-velocity B2B sales operation.

The Challenge:
Our SDR is a machine-hitting 700+ dials per day using Orum. But he's running out of fuel. We need 2,000‚Äì3,000 net new qualified leads per week, and we need our existing 55k database cleaned up and running like clockwork.

What You'll Do:

Lead Generation (Primary):
Source 2,000‚Äì3,000 qualified B2B contacts per week using your own tools, scraping methods, or data enrichment sources (we don't use ZoomInfo/Apollo)
Build hyper-targeted lists based on our ICP (specific industries, job titles, revenue bands-no spray and pray)
Prepare all leads for Orum dialer optimization and work feedback loops with our SDR to improve connect rates

Technical Data Operations:

Write Python or Node.js scripts to hit the HubSpot API and clean 55,000 legacy contacts in-place (phone formatting, email validation, deduplication)
Move us away from the Excel export/import cycle-everything should be programmatic
Build HubSpot automation workflows for lead follow-up and handoff between Marketing and Sales

Analytics & Optimization:

Set up dashboards tracking lead quality, conversion rates, and source performance
Provide regular reports on what's working so we can double down

What We're Looking For:

Proven B2B lead sourcing expertise (your own stack or methods-show us what you use)
Deep HubSpot experience (Marketing Hub Pro + Sales Hub Pro)
Comfortable writing scripts to interact with APIs (Python/Node.js preferred)
Familiarity with power dialers (Orum specifically)
You think in terms of ROI and practical results, not theoretical dashboards
Ability to work closely with our sales team to understand their needs

Scope & Expectations:
This is a hands-on role. You're not managing data - you're hunting for it and fixing it. We expect:

Consistent weekly lead delivery (2-3k qualified contacts)
Proactive communication with the sales team on lead quality and adjust strategy in real-time
Clean, documented scripts that our team can build on later
jobs.fullDescription:
SummaryWe're looking for a scrappy, technical lead generation specialist to fuel a high-velocity B2B sales operation.

The Challenge:
Our SDR is a machine-hitting 700+ dials per day using Orum. But he's running out of fuel. We need 2,000‚Äì3,000 net new qualified leads per week, and we need our existing 55k database cleaned up and running like clockwork.

What You'll Do:

Lead Generation (Primary):
Source 2,000‚Äì3,000 qualified B2B contacts per week using your own tools, scraping methods, or data enrichment sources (we don't use ZoomInfo/Apollo)
Build hyper-targeted lists based on our ICP (specific industries, job titles, revenue bands-no spray and pray)
Prepare all leads for Orum dialer optimization and work feedback loops with our SDR to improve connect rates

Technical Data Operations:

Write Python or Node.js scripts to hit the HubSpot API and clean 55,000 legacy contacts in-place (phone formatting, email validation, deduplication)
Move us away from the Excel export/import cycle-everything should be programmatic
Build HubSpot automation workflows for lead follow-up and handoff between Marketing and Sales

Analytics & Optimization:

Set up dashboards tracking lead quality, conversion rates, and source performance
Provide regular reports on what's working so we can double down

What We're Looking For:

Proven B2B lead sourcing expertise (your own stack or methods-show us what you use)
Deep HubSpot experience (Marketing Hub Pro + Sales Hub Pro)
Comfortable writing scripts to interact with APIs (Python/Node.js preferred)
Familiarity with power dialers (Orum specifically)
You think in terms of ROI and practical results, not theoretical dashboards
Ability to work closely with our sales team to understand their needs

Scope & Expectations:
This is a hands-on role. You're not managing data - you're hunting for it and fixing it. We expect:

Consistent weekly lead delivery (2-3k qualified contacts)
Proactive communication with the sales team on lead quality and adjust strategy in real-time
Clean, documented scripts that our team can build on later

jobs.title: Automation Engineer Needed: Expertise in n8n, Make.com, and VAPI
jobs.shortDescription:
Summary
Automation Agency ‚Äì Long-Term Partnership
Project Type: Ongoing Contract (Long-Term Engagement)
Experience Level: Expert / Agency Preferred
Compensation: Per-Project Basis (Negotiated Each Time)
Availability: High / Consistent Communication Required
Client: Silimind LLC ‚Äì AI Consulting & Automation Division

About Silimind
Silimind LLC is an AI consulting and automation company specializing in building intelligent business systems, data-driven workflows, and AI-integrated software. We partner with organizations across multiple industries to deploy scale-able automation solutions that reduce manual work and improve operational efficiency.

Role Overview
We are seeking a long-term Automation Expert to collaborate on internal automatons. The agency or expert will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality automation systems using AI, APIs, and no-code/low-code tools, principally an inbound call routing chat-bot. We are also seeking to extend the same bot to handle quires on our website.

This is a recurring partnership ‚Äî projects will be assigned continuously based on capability, performance, and responsiveness.

Responsibilities
- Design and build business automation workflows (CRM, lead management, analytics, marketing, support).
- Integrate AI tools and APIs into automation pipelines. USE JIRA AND BE COMFORTABLE WITH REPORTING DAILY.
- Maintain, test, and document automatons for stability and scalability.
- Collaborate with and advise Silimind‚Äôs Data & Automation Manager for project planning and delivery.
- Deliver clear workflow documentation and short Loom or screen recordings explaining setup.

Ensure timely completion and proactive communication during each project.

Requirements
- Proven experience with automation tools such as Make (Integromat), n8n.
- Strong knowledge of API integrations, webhooks, and JSON data handling.
- Ability to create scale-able workflows that can handle multi-system connections.
- Clear documentation and communication skills.
- High responsiveness and reliability for ongoing collaboration. Via Discord and Jira
- Experience working as or within an agency team preferred.

Preferred Skills
- Familiarity with AI integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, or other model APIs).
- Experience building reusable automation templates or white-label workflows.
- Understanding of CRM systems (GoHighLevel, HubSpot, Pipedrive, etc.).
- Capability to manage multiple active projects simultaneously.

Engagement Terms
- Long-term, ongoing contract.
- Compensation is per project, negotiated before each assignment.
- Workload based on availability and performance consistency.
- Collaboration tools: Jira, Discord, Google Drive, Loom.

Deliverables
Develop internal call routing AI.
Develop chat-bot on our website to handle customer quires. 
Provide regular updates and progress reports.

jobs.title: Amazon PPC Automation Software SaaS (Seller Central API + AI + Auto-Bidding Engine)
jobs.shortDescription:
We are looking for a highly experienced developer or team to build a full Amazon PPC Automation SaaS platform.

The software must connect directly to Amazon Seller Central via the Advertising API, pull all relevant PPC data in real time, and use AI/ML analysis + rule-based algorithms to fully automate all PPC campaign optimizations.

The system should intelligently:

Adjust bids automatically (up/down)

Identify profitable vs. wasteful keywords

Add new keywords from auto campaigns

Generate and apply negative keywords

Optimize budgets, placements, and match types

Move keywords from auto ‚Üí manual campaigns

Predict performance and scale winning campaigns

Reduce wasted ad spend and improve ROAS/ACOS


The goal: A fully automated Amazon PPC engine that outperforms manual PPC management.


---

Required Skills (MUST-HAVES)

Only apply if you have strong experience with ALL of the following:

‚úÖ 1. Amazon Advertising API (Latest Version)

Experience with Login with Amazon (LwA) authentication

Reading and writing campaigns, ad groups, keywords

Pulling reports (Search Terms, Campaigns, Keywords, Placements, etc.)

Creating and managing Sponsored Products, SB, SD campaigns


‚úÖ 2. Deep Knowledge of Amazon PPC

Auto vs Manual campaign strategies

Broad / Phrase / Exact match logic

Keyword harvesting

Optimal bidding structures

Negative keyword strategies

Placement bid multipliers

Overspend protection techniques


‚úÖ 3. AI / Machine Learning

We want the system to automatically analyze:

Keyword performance: ACOS, ROAS, CTR, CVR

Profitability and wasted spend

Bid change recommendations

Budget allocation across campaigns

Detection of burn keywords

Prediction of keyword performance trends


AI goals:

Reduce ACOS

Increase ROAS

Scale profitable keywords

Reduce wasted ad spend


‚úÖ 4. SaaS Platform Development

Backend (Node.js, Python, or Go)

Frontend (React, Vue, or Angular)

Multi-user architecture with subscription billing

Admin dashboard and user dashboards

Cloud infrastructure (AWS preferred)

Secure API token storage



---

Core Features ‚Äì Phase 1

1. Amazon API real-time data integration


2. AI keyword & bid performance analysis


3. Automatic bid algorithm


4. Automatic negative keyword engine


5. Keyword harvesting (Auto ‚Üí Manual)


6. Smart daily optimizations


7. Budget & bidding automation


8. User dashboard with key metrics




---

Phase 2 (optional later)

Multi-marketplace support (US/DE/UK/EU etc.)

Profit dashboard with COGS import

AI-based keyword discovery

Campaign builder for SP/SB/SD

API integrations (Shopify, WooCommerce, JTL, etc.)



---

What We Provide

Access to multiple Amazon Seller Accounts for testing

Clear workflows and PPC strategy logic

Long-term opportunity and continuous expansion

A real project with real scaling potential



---

Expectations

Only serious senior-level developers

Must show past projects with Amazon API and SaaS

Provide architecture suggestion + timeline + cost estimate

Strong communication and clean documentation

Ability to manage ongoing improvements

- A brief written summary of your experience with info-business / high-ticket mentorship funnels.

- Confirmation that you can handle the tasks listed in the job description.

jobs.title: Experienced DevOps Engineer for SwyftBooking ‚Äì Production & Security
jobs.shortDescription:
Role Overview
SwyftBooking is seeking an experienced DevOps Engineer to design, build, and manage our production infrastructure across all modules including flights, vacation rentals, car rentals, trucking, event ticketing, and more. This role requires deep expertise in cloud architecture, CICD, automation, security hardening, and maintaining highly available systems that support a fast-growing platform.

You will work closely with backend, frontend, mobile, and microservices teams to ensure seamless deployment, strong system reliability, and enterprise-grade security.

Key Responsibilities
Production Infrastructure
Build and maintain cloud-based production environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure).

Configure VPCs, load balancers, auto-scaling groups, NAT gateways, and DNS.

Implement infrastructure as code using tools such as Terraform or CloudFormation.

Ensure high availability, fault tolerance, and disaster recovery readiness for all services.

CI/CD Pipeline
Set up and manage CI/CD pipelines for MERN/MEAN, Flutter, and microservices using GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, or Jenkins.

Automate build, test, and deployment workflows across development, staging, and production.

Support containerization and orchestration with Docker and Kubernetes.

Microservices & Kafka
Deploy and monitor Kafka-based microservices used across SwyftBooking modules.

Implement event streaming, error monitoring, logging, and retry policies.

Optimize API gateway and inter-service communication for low latency and reliability.

Monitoring & Observability
Implement system monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, or CloudWatch.

Configure alerts for uptime, latency, CPU, memory, and service health.

Maintain centralized logging using ELK/EFK stacks.

Security & Compliance
Harden production environments following industry best practices.

Implement network-level and application-level firewalls.

Set up Identity and Access Management (IAM) with least-privilege policies.

Configure SSL/TLS certificates, HSTS, encryption at rest and in transit.

Monitor for vulnerabilities, perform patching, and ensure compliance with platform-wide security standards.

Support secure API integration with external vendors (Checkr, Stripe, Amadeus, Hotelbeds, etc.).

Automation & Optimization
Develop automation scripts using Bash, Python, or Node.js.

Optimize system performance, cost, and deployment speed.

Reduce manual operations by creating reliable workflows and automated processes.

Backup & Recovery
Configure automated backups, storage solutions, and snapshot strategies.

Conduct periodic disaster recovery testing.

Maintain business continuity plans for all SwyftBooking modules.

Collaboration
Work closely with backend developers, frontend developers, QA, and product teams.

Support development teams with testing environments, sandbox deployments, and rollout strategies.

Participate in architecture design and contribute to platform-wide scalability improvements.

Required Skills & Experience
3+ years of experience in DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), or Cloud Engineering.

Hands-on experience with AWS, GCP, or Azure.

Strong knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, and container orchestration.

Experience implementing complete CI/CD pipelines.

Good understanding of networking, load balancing, DNS, and cloud security.

Experience with Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible.

Familiarity with MongoDB, Node.js, React, Angular, and Flutter deployments.

Experience with Kafka or other event-streaming platforms.

Strong understanding of security protocols, IAM, encryption practices, and compliance.

Knowledge of monitoring tools such as Grafana, Prometheus, Datadog, ELK, or CloudWatch.

Preferred Qualifications
Experience with large-scale, multi-module systems or marketplace platforms.

Background supporting microservices architecture.

Prior experience in travel-tech or high-volume transactional systems.

Familiarity with payment gateways and secure payment flows.

Experience implementing zero-downtime deployments and blue-green/rolling updates.

What This Role Means for SwyftBooking
This DevOps Engineer will play a central role in preparing SwyftBooking for full production launch. You will ensure our infrastructure is stable, secure, scalable, monitored, and ready for millions of users across all service categories.

If you want, I can also:

Create a shorter job posting version,

Write an interview questionnaire,

Draft a DevOps onboarding checklist,

Or help define your production architecture diagram for the team.

jobs.title: Manual LinkedIn Outreach Specialist
jobs.shortDescription:
We need a manual LinkedIn outreach operator who can safely run 3 LinkedIn accounts and follow our exact templates and daily process.

This is a slow, careful, human-style outreach job - NOT automation, NOT mass sending, NOT spam.

Safety, precision, and consistency are the priorities.

üîç Your Daily Tasks
- Log into 3 LinkedIn accounts (we provide access + instructions)
- Send a small number of human-style connection requests (no rush)
- Send our pre-written message templates
- Follow strict safety limits (we give exact numbers per day)
- Track requests and accepted connections in a simple spreadsheet
- Keep the accounts safe ‚Äî NO 3rd party automation tools
Everything is manual and routine-based.

üìå Requirements
- Experience with manual LinkedIn outreach (NOT automated tools)
- Understands LinkedIn limits and how to avoid restrictions
- Reliable with daily routines and careful with account safety
- Good English (you don‚Äôt write messages ‚Äî but you follow instructions)
- Comfortable switching between multiple accounts
- Available 5‚Äì6 days per week
- Able to follow a strict, simple process every day

üö´ Not Allowed
Expandi, Zopto, Dripify, Octopus, or any automation tools
Mass spamming
Random messaging
Agencies
People who rush and risk bans
VAs who can‚Äôt follow daily structure

We want patient, disciplined, detail-oriented people.

üìà How We Work
Paid 2‚Äì3 day test.
If successful ‚Üí ongoing daily work.
Simple workflow (log in ‚Üí send ‚Üí track ‚Üí log out).

Fast weekly payment.

Clear communication and consistent routine.

üíº Skills Needed
- LinkedIn manual outreach
- Human-style sending
- Understanding of LinkedIn limits
- Consistency and daily discipline
- Basic spreadsheet organization

üí∞ Budget
$10‚Äì$30/h depending on experience.
We value reliability and safety more than speed.

üì© To Apply
Please send:
Your experience with manual LinkedIn outreach
Whether you‚Äôve ever handled multi-account outreach
How you avoid LinkedIn bans
Your daily availability

jobs.title: Web Designer / WordPress Developer ‚Äì Modern, Mobile-First Website for Insurance & Financial Advisory
jobs.shortDescription:
We are BALDREICH GmbH, a modern insurance and financial advisory company based in Austria.
We are looking for a professional Web Designer / WordPress Developer to build a clean, high-converting, mobile-first website that will serve two core purposes:

Representing BALDREICH GmbH as a trusted financial advisory brand

Building and strengthening the personal brand of our founder, Alexander Baldreich

The website must be:

modern

mobile-first

fast

SEO-optimized

clean & trustworthy

conversion-oriented

built to support authority + personal branding

scalable (20‚Äì30+ subpages)

fully compatible with our automation workflows (n8n + Salesforce)

Design should feel premium, minimalistic, confident, and personality-driven, with a clear professional tone.

üéØ Website Goal

The website should:

attract and convert new leads

clearly communicate our services

explain all insurance & finance topics in an easy, structured way

work perfectly on mobile (most traffic is mobile)

load extremely fast

connect seamlessly to our automation funnel (via Webhooks ‚Üí n8n ‚Üí Salesforce)

üìÑ Project Scope ‚Äì Pages Required

Total: 20‚Äì30 pages

A. Main Pages

Home

About / About BALDREICH GmbH

Contact

Book an Appointment (CTA Landing Page)

Privacy Policy, Imprint

B. Service Overviews

Insurance Overview

Financing Overview

Investment / Wealth Building Overview

C. Insurance Subpages (~10‚Äì15)

Examples:

Accident Insurance

Disability / Income Protection

Private Health Insurance

Legal Protection Insurance

Home & Household Insurance

Car Insurance (Liability / Partial / Full casco)

Life Insurance (Term / Unit-Linked)

Pension Planning

Travel Insurance

Natural Hazard / Elemental Insurance

D. Financing Subpages

Home Loans

Property Financing

Subsidies

Loan Conditions & Requirements

Costs & Process Overview

E. Investment Subpages

ETF

Bonds

Unit-Linked Products

Risk / Return Basics

Taxation (Capital Gains, KESt)

F. Target Group Pages

Young Adults

Families

Self-Employed

G. Blog Structure (optional)

Category:
‚ÄúInsurance Explained ‚Äì Austria‚Äù

üß© Required Skills (Must-Have)

Strong experience with WordPress

Expertise with mobile-first UI design

Experience with fast themes (Blocksy or GeneratePress preferred)

Gutenberg/Block Editor only (no Elementor/Divi)

Ability to create reusable templates for many subpages

Strong sense for UX + conversion

Good understanding of technical SEO (structure, speed, internal linking)

Clean, premium, modern design skills

Ability to deliver responsive layouts that look excellent on mobile

‚≠ê Nice to Have

Experience building websites for finance/insurance

Experience connecting WordPress forms to Webhooks (n8n)

Experience building large content websites

Ability to revise/optimize texts

Strong SEO background

üßæ Your Responsibilities

Build the full WordPress website

Configure theme, typography, spacing, global styles

Create high-quality mobile layouts

Create templates for subpages (insurance/finance topics)

Set up navigation + footer

Implement fast-loading structure (caching, images, etc.)

Integrate lead forms (FluentForms)

Ensure SEO-friendly structure

Provide clean documentation

(Optional) Select images/icons or propose visuals

Content will be provided by us (or you can support creating/optimizing it ‚Äî optional).

üéÅ What We Provide

Logo + brand colors

Wireframes (if needed)

Page structure

All written content (or you help with refinement)

Examples of design direction

Clear goals & UX expectations

Defined target audiences

Conversion goals / CTA logic

üí∂ Budget

‚Ç¨1,000 ‚Äì ‚Ç¨3,000
depending on experience, portfolio, and additional support (text/SEO).

üì¨ How to Apply

Please include:

Short introduction

Portfolio examples of similar modern, mobile-first websites

Confirmation that you work with Gutenberg (not Elementor)

Which theme you plan to use (Blocksy/GeneratePress preferred)

Your project process & design approach

Timeline

Hourly rate or fixed project price

(Optional) Suggestions for UX improvements or ideas for this website

jobs.title: N8N expert to build workflows
jobs.shortDescription:
Hello.

Looking for a skilled N8N automation specialist. Quote me a fixed price that include revisions to make sure workflow is functioning correctly. The flow is in article writing and wordpress uploading.

This is the first build

Build a workflow in n8n for article production where Claude writes articles that are then uploaded to WordPress as drafts


Step 1 - Upload Content Briefs:

I upload 1-30 text files containing content briefs for articles to Google Drive

Content briefs contain all necessary instructions for writing the articles

No additional instructions are needed beyond what's in the briefs

Step 2 - Detection:

System detects when new briefs have been uploaded

Step 3 - Reading Briefs:

System reads the briefs

Step 4 - Writing Articles:

Articles are written by Claude AI
Writing instructions for Claude will be uploaded and ready to use - instructions are lengthy

Step 5 - Save to Google Drive:

When Claude has finished writing according to the instructions and content brief, the article is uploaded to a separate folder in Google Drive

Step 6 - Manual Editing:

User edits the finished text

Step 7 - WordPress Upload:

After editing is complete, the article is uploaded to WordPress with the same formatting
Article is set as draft status - use pages, NOT posts

Workflow Complete

jobs.title: Senior Full Stack Developer (TypeScript) to Join Bee Techy as Team Lead
jobs.shortDescription:
At Bee Techy, we‚Äôre a high-flying software development agency, ranked in the top 1%, building next-gen solutions for startups and enterprises alike. We‚Äôre looking for a Team Lead to guide our buzzing development hive and ensure we stay at the cutting edge of technology.

As a Team Lead, you won‚Äôt just code‚Äîyou‚Äôll lead and mentor a team of passionate developers, ensuring that our technical standards are met, best practices are followed, and every project is executed with buzz-worthy precision.



Your Key Responsibilities üõ†Ô∏è:
* Technical Analysis: Break down new projects and features into actionable tasks, ensuring clear, efficient execution across the team.
* Code Review: Conduct thorough code reviews, mentoring developers on best practices, and merging approved code to our Dev branch.
* Production Deployments: Work closely with our DevOps team to deploy releases smoothly to dev, staging, and production, ensuring a flawless end-to-end pipeline.
* Bug Assignment: Oversee bug assignment, making sure newly created issues land in the right developer‚Äôs lap for speedy resolution.
* Team performance review: Monthly 1 on 1 performance reviews with developers.
* Team enhancement: Interviewing new candidates for the developer position.

Mentorship & Technical Leadership üèÜ:
* Mentor and Guide: Provide hands-on mentorship to the development team, helping them improve code quality, problem-solving skills, and technical expertise.
* Promote Best Practices: Ensure the team adheres to Bee Techy‚Äôs coding standards, including the DRY, KISS, and Single Responsibility Principles.
* Technical Approach Oversight: Lead the team in adopting and following our standardized tech stack and ensuring consistency in architectural decisions across projects.
* Team Development: Conduct regular knowledge-sharing sessions and technical workshops to keep the team up-to-date with new technologies and methodologies.
* Project Oversight: Ensure that technical solutions are scalable, maintainable, and aligned with the overall architectural vision of the project.
* Code Quality: Continuously advocate for clean, efficient, and secure code by championing automated testing, self-testing, and code reviews before features go live.
* Collaborate on Roadmaps: Work with Product Owners and other stakeholders to ensure that technical approaches align with business goals and project timelines.

Why Join the Bee Techy Hive? üêù:
* Cutting-Edge Tech: Lead projects built on the latest frameworks and tools like React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and more.
* Work with Talented Devs: Join a dynamic team that‚Äôs passionate about reshaping the digital landscape.
* Continuous Learning: Enjoy a culture of growth and innovation with ample opportunities to enhance your technical and leadership skills.


Your Skills and Experience üß†:
* 7+ years in software development, with significant experience in React.js/Node.js frameworks
* Proven expertise in code review, mentorship, and managing Git workflows
* Strong experience with DevOps pipelines, deployment processes, and release management
* A track record of implementing and enforcing best practices in a collaborative environment
* Exceptional leadership and communication skills, with the ability to mentor developers and keep projects on track

What‚Äôs in the Honey Pot for You üçØ:
* 30-40 hours per week, focused on 3-4 key projects at a time
* $25-$30/hour, with a 5% raise every 3 months based on KPI performance
* Work alongside our Project Managers, Designers, and QA teams to create industry-leading solutions

At Bee Techy, you‚Äôre not just a lead‚Äîyou‚Äôre a mentor, strategist, and innovator. If you‚Äôre ready to steer projects from idea to deployment and beyond, while guiding a team to greatness, we want you to lead our swarm! Apply now and let‚Äôs build something that stings (in the best way).

jobs.title: ActiveCampaign + WPForms Funnel Automation Specialist (Segmentation + Nurture Build)
jobs.shortDescription:
I need an ActiveCampaign specialist to build a single, clean automation that handles:

Generic ‚Äúneeds info‚Äù email sequence after a simple landing-page form

Processing a longer follow-up form (WPForms ‚Üí ActiveCampaign)

Segmenting contacts into TYPE-League vs TYPE-Team

Sending each segment into its own nurture sequence (League vs Team)

Tech stack:

WordPress + WPForms

ActiveCampaign (CRM + email)

Meta ads driving traffic into a baseball fundraiser funnel

What I already have:

Step-1 form (landing page): name + email only

Step-2 form (full info, multi-step with conditional logic) that knows if they are a league or a team

WPForms ‚Üí ActiveCampaign is already connected

Tags and custom fields are partially set up (LP tags, some custom fields, etc.)

What I need you to build inside ActiveCampaign:

ONE master automation that does all of this:

Trigger when the Step-1 form is submitted (or a specific tag is added)

Apply a ‚ÄúSTATUS-NeedsType‚Äù-style tag so we know they haven‚Äôt been segmented yet

Run a short, generic 4‚Äì5 email sequence asking them if they are a League or Team and nudging them to give more info

Use buttons/links inside emails that:

Add tag TYPE-League or TYPE-Team

Remove the NeedsType tag

Use a Goal to detect when TYPE-League or TYPE-Team is set and jump them into the correct path

Build a League Nurture branch (3‚Äì5 emails)

Build a Team Nurture branch (3‚Äì5 emails)

Make sure contacts who submit the full Step-2 form are automatically tagged and skip the generic ‚ÄúNeeds Type‚Äù emails as much as possible

I don‚Äôt need fancy design. I need:

Clean logic

Proper use of tags, goals, and If/Else branches

A structure that is easy for me to read and adjust later

Deliverables:

One working ActiveCampaign automation doing all of the above

A simple ‚Äúmap‚Äù or Loom video walking through:

Triggers

Main branches

Tags and goals being used

Where League vs Team sequences start

Ideal freelancer:

Proven ActiveCampaign experience (not just Mailchimp/HubSpot/etc.)

Comfortable working with WordPress + WPForms ‚Üí ActiveCampaign integrations

Has built segmentation / nurture flows before using tags + goals

Can communicate clearly and keep the build simple and organized

When you apply, please answer:

How many ActiveCampaign automations have you personally built?

Briefly describe a segmentation build you‚Äôve done with tags + goals (1‚Äì3 sentences).

What is your rough fixed price to build this one automation, including a short Loom walkthrough?

Please start your reply with the word ‚ÄúAC/BASEBALL‚Äù so I know you read the whole post.

jobs.title: SmartSheet Expert
jobs.shortDescription:
About Us: 
Smart Build specializes in apartment renovations and multifamily construction projects across the U.S. We pride ourselves on efficiency, innovation, and delivering exceptional results to our clients. We are seeking a talented Smartsheet & HubSpot Integration Specialist to optimize our operational workflows and ensure seamless integration between platforms. 

About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled SmartSheet Expert who can not only build advanced SmartSheet solutions but also transition existing company processes into SmartSheet, ensuring everything is organized, streamlined, and simple for the team to manage moving forward. This role is critical as we standardize our operations and create a unified project management ecosystem.

Key Responsibilities
- SmartSheet Development & Automation
- Design and build advanced SmartSheet dashboards, reports, templates, and automated workflows.
- Implement approval flows, reminders, update requests, and cross-sheet automation.
- Build scalable, repeatable SmartSheet structures for multi-project and multi-team environments.

Process Transition & Optimization
- Audit current workflows, spreadsheets, trackers, and repeatable processes used across departments.
- Translate existing systems into SmartSheet‚Äîcentralizing data, eliminating duplication, and improving visibility.
- Standardize all processes into SmartSheet templates, forms, and dashboards that the team can easily maintain.
- Ensure long-term usability by setting up logical file architecture, naming conventions, permissions, and governance.
- Lead the transition from legacy tools (Excel, Google Sheets, ClickUp, Asana, etc.) into SmartSheet.

Operational Efficiency
- Identify inefficiencies and present SmartSheet-driven solutions to streamline workflow.
- Support project scheduling, budgeting, resource planning, and portfolio management.
- Build tools that simplify handoffs, collaboration, approvals, and reporting.

Data Management & Reporting
- Create executive dashboards with real-time KPIs, timelines, project health, and performance metrics.
- Set up DataMesh, Data Shuttle, and integrations to maintain data accuracy.
- Produce automated weekly reports for leadership and operations teams.

Support, Training & Documentation
- Provide ongoing support for new Smartsheet systems.
- Train team members, create SOPs, and ensure all processes are easy to understand and follow.
- Maintain a roadmap of future improvements to further enhance system efficiency.

Qualifications
- Demonstrated experience building and managing advanced SmartSheet environments.
- Proven ability to take existing operational workflows and translate them into SmartSheet solutions.
 -Strong understanding of process mapping, system organization, and workflow design.
- Skilled in formulas, dashboards, automation, DataMesh, Data Shuttle, and (preferred) Control Center.
- Analytical thinker with excellent communication and problem-solving abilities.
- Experience managing change across teams and training users on new tools.

Preferred Skills
- SmartSheet certifications a plus.
- Experience in construction, operations, PMO, or multi-project environments.
- Familiarity with Excel, SQL, BI tools, Tableau/PowerBI, or integration platforms.

Why This Role Matters
You will be the architect behind how the company organizes, tracks, and manages work. Your SmartSheet solutions will become the backbone of visibility, consistency, and scalability across the entire team.
 
About Us 
We are a dynamic company with a clear vision for optimizing operations. We need someone who can implement our vision efficiently and provide insights to improve our processes. If you‚Äôre innovative, detail-oriented, and thrive in a collaborative environment, we‚Äôd love to hear from you. Please include the word "Efficiency" in the first line of your application to confirm you have read the full job description. 
 
What We Offer 
Competitive compensation based on expertise and project scope. 
Opportunity for ongoing support work and potential long-term collaboration. 
A supportive team with a strong vision for operational excellence. 
Apply now if you‚Äôre ready to take on this challenge and help us optimize our systems for success!

jobs.title: Part-time ecommerce bookkeeper/executive assistant
jobs.shortDescription:
COMPANY BACKGROUND

We are a small but tight-knit team running ecommerce operations for large brands in the US. Mutual trust and hard work are the foundation of everything we do. We take very good care of our team, provided they take very good care of our parent company.

ROLE BACKGROUND

This role is some mixture of bookkeeping and general finance work. You will operate effectively as an executive assistant with a specialization in financial tasks. As your hiring manager, I will personally mentor you and provide all I can to help you succeed. A big focus of mine is to use AI and AI agents to automate our workflows, and I will focus on mentoring you to develop these skills as well if you don't already have experience here.

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE

Non-Negotiables:
   - Reliability & consistency - Meets deadlines, communicates proactively, shows up consistently
   - Strong work ethic - Takes initiative, follows through on tasks, doesn't need constant oversight
   - Genuine interest in bookkeeping/finance work - Enjoys the detail-oriented nature of the work rather than viewing it as drudgery
   - Moderate bookkeeping experience - 1-3 years doing practical bookkeeping work (doesn't need to be ecommerce-specific)
   - QuickBooks Online working knowledge - Comfortable with basic functions;

Important but Teachable:
   - Excel/Google Sheets competency - Basic formulas and data organization (Jeremiah can teach advanced techniques)
   - Ability to learn new platforms - Willing to navigate unfamiliar software to pull reports
   - Clear communication - Asks questions when stuck, provides status updates

Nice-to-Haves:
   - Ecommerce bookkeeping background
   - Previous executive/virtual assistant experience
   - Familiarity with invoicing workflows

WORKLOAD OVERVIEW

Core Bookkeeping (60-70% of time)
   - Transaction entry and categorization in QBO under Jeremiah's direction
   - Bank/credit card reconciliations
   - Data entry and cleanup tasks
   - Assisting with month-end close procedures that have been established

Administrative Finance Tasks (30-40% of time)
   - Pulling reports from ecommerce platforms
   - Creating invoices following company templates/instructions
   - Organizing financial documents and records
   - Ad hoc tasks like vendor follow-up, data compilation, or research

OTHER NOTES

Controller support: Our team will provide controller support for strategic decisions, complex accounting treatments, system setup, and quality control. This role will execute the recurring tasks reliably and bring questions to the Controller.

Estimated Weekly Hours: ~15-20 hours with opportunities to expand.

Administrative Finance Tasks (30-40% of time)
   - Pulling reports from ecommerce platforms
   - Creating invoices following company templates/instructions
   - Organizing financial documents and records
   - Ad hoc tasks like vendor follow-up, data compilation, or research

OTHER NOTES

Controller support: Our team will provide controller support for strategic decisions, complex accounting treatments, system setup, and quality control. This role will execute the recurring tasks reliably and bring questions to the Controller.

Estimated Weekly Hours: ~15-20 hours with opportunities to expand.

jobs.title: N8N expert to build workflows
jobs.shortDescription:
Hello.

Looking for a skilled N8N automation specialist. Quote me a fixed price that include revisions to make sure workflow is functioning correctly. The flow is in article writing and wordpress uploading.

This is the first build

Build a workflow in n8n for article production where Claude writes articles that are then uploaded to WordPress as drafts


Step 1 - Upload Content Briefs:

I upload 1-30 text files containing content briefs for articles to Google Drive

Content briefs contain all necessary instructions for writing the articles

No additional instructions are needed beyond what's in the briefs

Step 2 - Detection:

System detects when new briefs have been uploaded

Step 3 - Reading Briefs:

System reads the briefs

Step 4 - Writing Articles:

Articles are written by Claude AI
Writing instructions for Claude will be uploaded and ready to use - instructions are lengthy

Step 5 - Save to Google Drive:

When Claude has finished writing according to the instructions and content brief, the article is uploaded to a separate folder in Google Drive

Step 6 - Manual Editing:

User edits the finished text

Step 7 - WordPress Upload:

After editing is complete, the article is uploaded to WordPress with the same formatting
Article is set as draft status - use pages, NOT posts

Workflow Complete

jobs.title: N8N Specialist Needed for Multi-Tenant RAG and Document Management
jobs.shortDescription:
Project Goal:
Develop robust N8N workflows for a multi-tenant RAG chatbot backend, handling the complete lifecycle of documents: secure upload, indexing, and crucial deletion/de-indexing. The RAG process must intelligently select documents from both a private customer repository and a shared central repository.

Required Expertise:
‚Ä¢	Essential: n8n Workflow Automation (Webhook, HTTP Request, Function/Code nodes).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture (chunking, embedding, indexing).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Advanced experience with Vector Database APIs (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant) and implementing metadata filtering for multi-tenancy and vector deletion by metadata/ID.
‚Ä¢	Strong Plus: Experience with Agentic AI systems (designing LLM calls that return structured decisions/tags).
‚Ä¢	Familiarity: Integration with major LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, etc.).

Part 1: Document Lifecycle Management Workflows (
The consultant must build two separate N8N workflows for managing document data: Ingestion and Deletion.
1a. Document Ingestion Workflow (Upload & Indexing)
‚Ä¢	Secure Upload Endpoint: Create an N8N Webhook to securely receive file uploads (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT) along with the associated customer_id and a unique document_id.
‚Ä¢	Indexing Workflow:
1.	Associate the file with the customer_id and document_id.
2.	Chunk the document content.
3.	Generate embeddings for each chunk.
4.	Store the chunks and their embeddings in the Vector Database, ensuring that both the customer_id and the document_id are included as metadata for every stored vector.
1b. Document Deletion Workflow (De-indexing)
‚Ä¢	Deletion Endpoint: Create a separate N8N Webhook to receive a request containing the customer_id and the document_id of the file to be removed.
‚Ä¢	De-indexing Workflow:
1.	Use the customer_id and document_id to make an API call to the Vector Database.
2.	Crucially, use metadata filtering to delete all vectors associated with that specific document_id and customer_id combination from the index.
3.	Send a success confirmation.

Part 2: Agentic RAG Orchestration Workflow 
This workflow handles the live querying and response generation:
1.	Receive Query Request: Triggered by a Webhook receiving the customer_id and user_query.
2.	AI Agent Decision: Send the user_query to an external AI Agent/LLM service. The Agent must analyze the request and return a structured JSON response identifying the necessary document tags.
3.	Dynamic RAG Orchestration:
o	Execute parallel HTTP Requests to the Vector Database(s).
o	Private RAG: Query the customer's dedicated data, using metadata filtering to filter by the received customer_id AND the private_tags.
o	Shared RAG: Query the central repository, filtering only by the shared_tags.
4.	Final Generation: Merge the retrieved text chunks and use the combined context to generate the final response via an LLM API call.
5.	Return Response: Respond to the original Webhook request with the final generated text.

Deliverables:
1.	A fully functional Document Ingestion N8N Workflow (JSON export).
2.	A fully functional Document Deletion N8N Workflow (JSON export) that successfully removes vectors based on document_id and customer_id.
3.	A fully functional Agentic RAG Orchestration N8N Workflow (JSON export).
4.	Detailed Documentation on workflow logic, API connections, and schema requirements.
5.	A clear demonstration that the RAG workflow only retrieves private documents linked to the correct customer_id and that deleted documents are immediately excluded from retrieval.
