jobs.title: N8N/Zapier/Make expert needed
jobs.shortDescription:
We are seeking an experienced AI Automation Engineer to build and maintain an intelligent automation system for our business. This system will use AI agents, workflow automation tools, and API integrations to streamline internal processes, reduce manual work, and improve operational efficiency.

Position Overview

The engineer will be responsible for creating an AI-driven system that can understand business inputs, make decisions, and automatically trigger operational workflows. The solution must be reliable, scalable, and fully integrated with our existing tools.

Key Responsibilities
AI Agent Development

Build an AI agent capable of interpreting incoming data (text, forms, messages).

Use LLMs (OpenAI/Claude/etc.) to classify intents and generate structured actions.

Create rule-based and AI-based decision logic for various business scenarios.

Workflow Automation

Develop operational workflows using Make.com or n8n.

Automations may include:

Lead processing & CRM updates

Customer onboarding workflows

Task creation & internal notifications

Email/SMS/WhatsApp sequences

Data routing & classification

Ensure workflows are optimized, stable, and maintainable.

API & Tool Integrations

Connect AI agents with third-party and internal systems.

Integrations may include:

Airtable, Notion, Google Sheets

Gmail / Outlook

Slack / Teams

Twilio / WhatsApp

Custom API endpoints

Handle authentication, error-handling, and data formatting.

Testing, Monitoring & Documentation

Perform end-to-end testing with real business scenarios.

Monitor automation performance and implement fail-safes.

Document workflows, logic, and update procedures for internal teams.

Requirements

Strong experience with Make.com, n8n, or Zapier

Proven ability to build AI-powered workflows

Familiarity with OpenAI/LLM prompt engineering

Solid understanding of REST APIs, JSON, and webhooks

Strong debugging and problem-solving skills

Ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions

Preferred Qualifications

Experience building AI Agents for operations or customer workflows

Experience with CRM automation (Airtable / HubSpot / Notion)

Ability to design scalable system architecture

About the Role

This position is focused on creating a real production automation system for our business. The AI agent and workflows will be used daily by our team, so reliability, clarity, and scalability are essential.

jobs.title: n8n Automation Expert for YouTube Split Testing & Multi-Platform Posting
jobs.shortDescription:
n8n Automation Expert Needed for YouTube Split Testing and Multi-Platform Video Distribution System

I need an experienced n8n automation developer to build a complete content publishing system for my real estate media channel. I produce both YouTube long-form videos and high-volume short-form content. I need an automated workflow that handles posting, scheduling, and metadata across multiple platforms.

This project requires advanced automation, API experience, and production-grade workflow design.

Project Overview

n8n should automatically process long-form YouTube videos, run YouTube split testing, and distribute short-form videos to multiple social platforms. All content will be placed into Google Drive using a structured naming convention.

The system must support two modes for titles. If I provide title options, use them. If titles are blank, OpenAI should generate three title options and a recommended best title.

Requirements
1. Long-Form YouTube Automation

Monitor Google Drive for new long-form video files

Parse filenames including month, week, topic, funnel level, and type

Read and update metadata in Google Sheets

Use my title options or generate titles with OpenAI if none are provided

Generate SEO descriptions and tags with OpenAI

Upload videos to YouTube as private and schedule publishing

Upload three thumbnails

Set up YouTube Test and Compare split testing using three titles and three thumbnails

Write back YouTube video ID and URL to Google Sheets

2. Short-Form Multi-Platform Posting

Monitor Google Drive for new short-form files

Parse filename using the same naming rules

Generate platform-specific captions with OpenAI

Upload short-form videos to:

YouTube Shorts

Instagram Reels through Meta Graph API

Facebook Business Page

TikTok using supported upload method

LinkedIn Video

Write all post URLs and IDs to Google Sheets

Update status fields

3. Optional Thumbnail Rotation

Rotate YouTube thumbnails daily for published long-form videos

Update Google Sheets with current thumbnail

Log changes

Naming Convention

All files follow this pattern:

mX_wkY_vidZ-topic-funnel-type.ext

Examples:
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-LONG.mp4
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-thumbA.jpg
m1_wk2_vid3-Gated-Communities-narrow-SHORT1.mp4

Workflows must parse all values from the filename.

Technical Skills Needed

Advanced n8n development

Google Drive and Google Sheets automation

YouTube Data API including uploading, scheduling, thumbnails, and split testing

Meta Graph API for Instagram Reels and Facebook Page posts

TikTok upload integrations

LinkedIn video posting

OpenAI for metadata and caption generation

Error handling, retry logic, and workflow logging

Deliverables

Fully built workflows including:

Drive to Sheets intake

Long-form YouTube upload and split testing

Short-form multi-platform posting

Optional thumbnail rotation

All API connections configured and tested

Reliable read and write operations to Google Sheets

Documentation for setup and maintenance

Optional brief walkthrough video

How to Apply

Please provide:

Examples of advanced n8n workflows you have built

Experience with YouTube API

Experience with Meta Graph API or TikTok uploads

Confirmation you can build YouTube split testing

Your estimated timeline

Identity verification mechanism (only verified email/phone for MVP).

Child Linking

Management of multiple children/accounts.

Essential Dashboard

Secure two-way chat with authorization.

Autonomous registration with subsequent parental verification.

Profile and Preferences

Customizable profile with avatar, interests, communication style.

Basic Matching

Advanced proprietary algorithm (Personality, Style, Experiences).

Session Booking

Search and booking with advanced filters.

Integrated Video Call

Interactive tools (whiteboard, screen sharing).

Emotional Diary

Simple free-text feature with timestamp, accessible ONLY by the user.
Structured diary with tags, charts, and integration with the Psychologist.


Psychologist Interface (Service Provider)
Psychologist Onboarding

Upload of a basic profile. Manual verification of professional credentials by an administrator.
Fully automated and complete verification flow.

Dashboard/Agenda

Display of appointment list and direct link to video call.
Advanced calendar management (external synchronization).

Clinical Notes

Private and encrypted text area (access only for Psychologist) to take session notes. MUST-HAVE feature.
Structured notes system (SOAP, etc.) and progress tracking.

Billing (Mock-up)

Display of delivered session balance, pending payment. Do not implement complex automatic billing for MVP.
Automatic billing system and fiscal reports.


Interface Integration & Security
End-to-End Encryption

Rigorous implementation of End-to-End Encryption for chat (if implemented) and video calls.
CRITICAL.

Data Access Policies

Encode in the Backend the rules: Parent CANNOT access session or diary contents; User CANNOT access clinical notes.
CRITICAL.

Minor Policy

Creation and integration of a specific Privacy Policy for minors, with mandatory checkbox.
CRITICAL.

Emergency Protocol

Insert a clearly visible notice on all interfaces with procedures to follow in case of emergency/crisis.
High priority.

Feedback System (MVP)

A simple link to a Google/Typeform form to collect feedback from Users, Parents, and Psychologists.
Medium priority.


Testing
Internal Testing

Test the complete cycle: Parent Pays ‚Üí User Books ‚Üí Psychologist Delivers the Session.
Success rate of booked/delivered session ‚â•95%.

Closed Beta

Release (Web/iOS/Android).
Parent Conversion (Package Purchase) ‚â•30% and Usage Rate (Session Completed) ‚â•70%.


Legal Documentation and Informed Consent (Psychologist/User Interface)
1. Psychologist Document Repository

Creation of an area in the Psychologist Interface to upload standard documents: Informed Consent, etc. (Only PDF/Text file upload).

2. Admin Review/Approval Flow

Administrative functionality for manual approval of legal documents uploaded by each Psychologist before they can be sent to Users.

3. Electronic "Signature" System

Integration of a component for consent acquisition. For MVP: a mandatory checkbox ("I have read and accept the terms/informed consent of [Psychotherapist Name]") before booking.

4. User Informed Consent Flow

Critical Requirement: The user (Adolescent/Under 35) MUST view and accept the Psychologist's Informed Consent before accessing the booking/session screen.

5. Consent Registration

In the database, create an immutable record certifying: Which document (version/timestamp) was accepted, by Whom (User ID), and When (Date/Time).

6. Documentation Access

Functionality allowing the User and Parent (separately) to review accepted documents at any time (only documents, not clinical notes).

jobs.title: Senior AI DevOps & Infrastructure Engineer (Bilingual CN/EN) | Open WebUI, n8n, RAG Ops, AWS/GCP
jobs.shortDescription:
Project Overview:
We are Upskill.Pro, a fast-growing AI Agent platform democratizing top-tier strategy consulting for managers and leaders. We function as a "Outcome-as-a-Service" partner, integrating diverse AI agents to solve complex business problems.

We are looking for a Part-Time Senior DevOps Engineer who specializes in AI/LLM Infrastructure. You will not just manage servers; you will orchestrate the lifecycle of AI agents, ensuring our global product interacts seamlessly with Cloud LLMs, Open WebUI, and n8n workflows.

Role Type: Part-time (Long-term potential)
Location: Remote (Global)
Language: Native/Fluent in Chinese (Mandarin) and English is a MUST.

üöÄ The Mission (What you will do)
You will own the reliability, security, and performance of our AI infrastructure. This includes:
1. CI/CD & Automation (The Foundation)
    Design and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines for our AI applications.
    Automate deployment processes to ensure rapid and safe code releases.
    Requirement: Move us from manual deployments to a fully automated "Click-to-Ship" environment.

2. AI Stack Optimization (Open WebUI + n8n + RAG)
    Performance Tuning: Optimize the latency and throughput of Open WebUI and n8n self-hosted instances. Troubleshoot websocket connections and workflow execution bottlenecks.
    RAG Ops: Maintain the vector database infrastructure and RAG pipelines, ensuring high availability for document retrieval (JSON/PDF parsing) .
    Security: Harden the environment to protect sensitive user interaction data and PII . Manage API keys and secrets securely (Vault/AWS Secrets Manager).

3. Cloud & LLM Infrastructure (AWS + GCP)
    Manage a hybrid cloud environment (AWS & GCP).
    LLMOps: Monitor Cloud LLM (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini via Vertex AI) API usage, latency, and error rates. Implement alerts for quota limits and cost anomalies.
    Observability: Set up comprehensive logging and monitoring dashboards (e.g., Grafana, Prometheus, or native cloud tools) to track system health and "Model Drift" .

üéØ Who We Are Looking For
1. Bilingual Communication: You can discuss complex technical architecture in Chinese with the core team and document/communicate in professional English for global operations.
2. DevOps Architect: 5+ years of experience with Linux, Docker, Kubernetes (optional but preferred), and Nginx. 
3. AI/Low-Code Enthusiast: Proven experience self-hosting and scaling Open WebUI and workflow automation tools like n8n. You understand the specific resource needs of GenAI apps.
4. Cloud Native: Deep expertise in AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, VPC) and GCP.
5. Scripting: Proficient in Python and Bash.
6. Availability: Flexible to support a product running 24/7 globally; available for occasional emergency response.

üîß Tech Stack
Core AI: Open WebUI, n8n, RAG (Vector DBs like Chroma/Qdrant/Pinecone).
Cloud: AWS, GCP.
Ops: Docker, GitHub Actions, Terraform (IaC).
LLM Integration: API Gateway management for OpenAI/Anthropic.

üíô Why Join Upskill.Pro?
1. Cutting-Edge Tech: Work with the latest Agentic workflows and LLM orchestration tools.
2. High Impact: Your work directly empowers managers and consultants globally.
3. Flexible & Remote: Work from anywhere, with a team that values output over hours.

jobs.title: n8n Automation Expert Needed ‚Äì YouTube Strategy Workflow (Thumbnail + Title + Top Video Analysis)
jobs.shortDescription:
I‚Äôm looking for an advanced n8n automation expert who can build a complete YouTube strategist workflow. The system should automatically analyze thumbnails, video titles, and top-performing videos for specific topics, then output structured insights I can use for content planning.

This is NOT just a basic API call workflow‚ÄîI need a well-designed, reliable automation system with intelligent parsing and clear outputs.

What the Workflow Should Do
1. Topic Input

Accept a list of topics or keywords (manual input or Google Sheet/Notion trigger).

2. Fetch Top Videos

Use YouTube Data API to retrieve top-performing videos for each topic.

Extract metadata: views, engagement, publish date, tags, etc.

3. Analyze Video Titles

Parse titles for:

Common hooks

Keywords

Patterns and formulas

(Optional) Send titles to an LLM node for higher-level analysis.

4. Analyze Thumbnails

Extract thumbnail URLs

Run them through an LLM or image-analysis API to evaluate:

Colors

Text usage

Composition

Style patterns

5. Output Insights

Clear structured output (Notion, Google Sheets, Airtable, or email), including:

Top patterns for titles

Thumbnail trend summary

Top 10 most relevant videos per topic

Actionable recommendations

Template suggestions (title formulas, thumbnail styles)

Ideal Freelancer

You should have:

Advanced experience with n8n (workflows, error handling, modular design)

Strong knowledge of YouTube Data API

Ability to integrate LLM nodes (OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, etc.)

Experience with content or YouTube competitive analysis

Strong documentation and system design skills

(Bonus) Experience with Notion or Sheets automation

Deliverables

Complete n8n workflow with:

API connections

Automation logic

LLM analysis steps

Clean modular structure

Documentation/SOP

One test run showing the system working end-to-end

Optional: improvements or suggestions for scaling the workflow

jobs.title: Build a Full Tinder Automation Agent (n8n or Python + LLM DM + Smart Swiping + Location Switching)
jobs.shortDescription:
Tinder Automation Agent ‚Äì n8n or Python + LLM DM + Smart Swiping

I‚Äôm looking for a developer experienced in n8n, private/mobile APIs, or Python automation to build a personal-use Tinder automation agent.
This is not OFM, not for resale ‚Äî I‚Äôve previously run dating funnels using VAs and IG ManyChat, and now I want a clean automated setup to generate consistent matches and move them off-platform (WhatsApp / Instagram).

What I need:
1. Smart Swiping Automation

Swipe all right (default)

OR exclude negative keywords (e.g., ‚Äútrans‚Äù, phone numbers, OF, Snapchat, etc.)

Optional: basic beauty filtering if you can implement a simple heuristic

Use Tinder private API endpoints (/like, /pass with content_hash, s_number, etc.)

2. Conversation Starters

Fixed opener (based on name or city)

OR LLM-generated opener based on their bio + photos

3. LLM Conversation Continuation

Either follow a script or use OpenAI models (I have credits)

You set the base system prompt; I‚Äôll refine it

Messaging goal: build interest ‚Üí get WhatsApp or Instagram

4. Location Switching

Ability to set custom locations (beyond Travel Mode)

If required, I can provide proxies, GPS spoofing, or IP resources

5. Multi-Account Support

I have 3 personal Tinder accounts

If easy, you can also help create additional accounts

Should run accounts safely in parallel

6. Deployment

Fresh DigitalOcean VPS ($200/60d credits)

Full setup of self-hosted n8n or a Python backend

Stable, secure, documented workflow I can modify later

I already have the base n8n Tinder workflow (profile, queue, likes, update bio)

Ideal Skills

n8n advanced

Python automation

Experience with private APIs

OpenAI / LLM chat agents

Docker & VPS setup

Optional: proxy/anti-detect knowledge

Goal

A reliable Tinder agent that swipes, filters, opens, chats with LLM, and moves matches off Tinder. Personal abundance, not OFM.

jobs.title: AI Voice Bot Development with PBX Integration
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
We need an experienced developer to build an AI-powered Voice Bot that integrates directly with our PBX system to handle real-time phone calls with customers. The goal is to automate conversations, collect information, verify customer identity, and provide guided responses‚Äîsimilar to a call-center virtual agent.

Scope of Work

The final solution must include:

1. Voice Bot (AI Assistant)
	‚Ä¢	Natural, human-like conversation using an LLM (OpenAI, Deepgram, AssemblyAI, or similar).
	‚Ä¢	Real-time speech-to-text (STT) and text-to-speech (TTS).
	‚Ä¢	Ability to recognize intent, answer questions, and follow conversation flows.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to trigger internal actions (e.g., send data to our backend, fetch customer info, update status).

2. PBX Integration

Our PBX allows SIP/VoIP integration. The bot must be able to:
	‚Ä¢	Receive inbound calls routed from our PBX.
	‚Ä¢	Make outbound calls if needed.
	‚Ä¢	Maintain stable real-time audio streaming (WebRTC, SIP, RTP).
	‚Ä¢	Detect DTMF signals if required.
	‚Ä¢	Log call results.

3. Backend Integration

We provide a backend with customer data.
The bot must:
	‚Ä¢	Fetch customer info using API (REST/JSON).
	‚Ä¢	Update conversation status during or after the call.
	‚Ä¢	Send structured data (JSON) back to our backend.

4. Core Features Required
	‚Ä¢	Real-time bi-directional audio streaming.
	‚Ä¢	Transcription with high accuracy (Spanish Chile preferred).
	‚Ä¢	Conversation memory during the call.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to follow a defined flow (gather data ‚Üí validate ‚Üí escalate).
	‚Ä¢	Failover logic (if bot doesn‚Äôt understand, escalate to human agent).
	‚Ä¢	Call recording (optional).
	‚Ä¢	Multi-user support.

5. Additional Details
	‚Ä¢	Language: Spanish (Chile).
	‚Ä¢	Bot must be accessible via mobile and landline calls.
	‚Ä¢	High reliability, optimized for low latency.
	‚Ä¢	Must work seamlessly with the PBX routing rules.
	‚Ä¢	We will provide sample call flows and scripts.

‚∏ª

üéØ What We Will Provide
	‚Ä¢	Our PBX connection details (SIP/VoIP/WebRTC endpoint).
	‚Ä¢	Backend API endpoints.
	‚Ä¢	Example scripts and business logic.
	‚Ä¢	A test phone number for calls.

‚∏ª

üîß Preferred Technologies (Not mandatory)

Experience with any of these is a plus:
	‚Ä¢	PBX: Asterisk, FreePBX, Issabel, Genesys, Cisco, or custom SIP provider.
	‚Ä¢	AI/Voice frameworks:
	‚Ä¢	Twilio Media Streams
	‚Ä¢	Deepgram Live / Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	OpenAI Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	AssemblyAI Realtime
	‚Ä¢	VAPI.dev
	‚Ä¢	Voiceflow
	‚Ä¢	Protocols: SIP, RTP, WebRTC.
	‚Ä¢	Backend: Python/Node.js preferred.

‚∏ª

üìå Deliverables
	1.	Fully working voice bot integrated with our PBX.
	2.	API connection with our backend.
	3.	Documentation (installation + architecture).
	4.	Test cases + example calls.
	5.	Source code repo (GitHub/GitLab).

‚∏ª

üßë‚Äçüíª Required Experience
	‚Ä¢	Strong knowledge in VoIP/PBX (SIP, RTP, Asterisk, etc.)
	‚Ä¢	Experience building voice bots or conversational AI.
	‚Ä¢	Experience integrating real-time audio streaming with AI models.
	‚Ä¢	Proven record of similar past work on Upwork.

‚∏ª

‚è±Ô∏è Timeline

We expect delivery in 2‚Äì4 weeks once the project begins.

jobs.title: N8N Specialist Needed for Multi-Tenant RAG and Document Management
jobs.shortDescription:
Project Goal:
Develop robust N8N workflows for a multi-tenant RAG chatbot backend, handling the complete lifecycle of documents: secure upload, indexing, and crucial deletion/de-indexing. The RAG process must intelligently select documents from both a private customer repository and a shared central repository.

Required Expertise:
‚Ä¢	Essential: n8n Workflow Automation (Webhook, HTTP Request, Function/Code nodes).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture (chunking, embedding, indexing).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Advanced experience with Vector Database APIs (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant) and implementing metadata filtering for multi-tenancy and vector deletion by metadata/ID.
‚Ä¢	Strong Plus: Experience with Agentic AI systems (designing LLM calls that return structured decisions/tags).
‚Ä¢	Familiarity: Integration with major LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, etc.).

Part 1: Document Lifecycle Management Workflows (
The consultant must build two separate N8N workflows for managing document data: Ingestion and Deletion.
1a. Document Ingestion Workflow (Upload & Indexing)
‚Ä¢	Secure Upload Endpoint: Create an N8N Webhook to securely receive file uploads (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT) along with the associated customer_id and a unique document_id.
‚Ä¢	Indexing Workflow:
1.	Associate the file with the customer_id and document_id.
2.	Chunk the document content.
3.	Generate embeddings for each chunk.
4.	Store the chunks and their embeddings in the Vector Database, ensuring that both the customer_id and the document_id are included as metadata for every stored vector.
1b. Document Deletion Workflow (De-indexing)
‚Ä¢	Deletion Endpoint: Create a separate N8N Webhook to receive a request containing the customer_id and the document_id of the file to be removed.
‚Ä¢	De-indexing Workflow:
1.	Use the customer_id and document_id to make an API call to the Vector Database.
2.	Crucially, use metadata filtering to delete all vectors associated with that specific document_id and customer_id combination from the index.
3.	Send a success confirmation.

Part 2: Agentic RAG Orchestration Workflow 
This workflow handles the live querying and response generation:
1.	Receive Query Request: Triggered by a Webhook receiving the customer_id and user_query.
2.	AI Agent Decision: Send the user_query to an external AI Agent/LLM service. The Agent must analyze the request and return a structured JSON response identifying the necessary document tags.
3.	Dynamic RAG Orchestration:
o	Execute parallel HTTP Requests to the Vector Database(s).
o	Private RAG: Query the customer's dedicated data, using metadata filtering to filter by the received customer_id AND the private_tags.
o	Shared RAG: Query the central repository, filtering only by the shared_tags.
4.	Final Generation: Merge the retrieved text chunks and use the combined context to generate the final response via an LLM API call.
5.	Return Response: Respond to the original Webhook request with the final generated text.

Deliverables:
1.	A fully functional Document Ingestion N8N Workflow (JSON export).
2.	A fully functional Document Deletion N8N Workflow (JSON export) that successfully removes vectors based on document_id and customer_id.
3.	A fully functional Agentic RAG Orchestration N8N Workflow (JSON export).
4.	Detailed Documentation on workflow logic, API connections, and schema requirements.
5.	A clear demonstration that the RAG workflow only retrieves private documents linked to the correct customer_id and that deleted documents are immediately excluded from retrieval.

jobs.title: AI Trainer ‚Äì Prompt Engineering & Role-Based Advisory Board Setup
jobs.shortDescription:
We are seeking for AI Trainer with strong experience in prompt engineering, workforce enablement, and role-tailored AI advisory board design. Your role will be to train our teams on how to craft effective prompts and configure structured AI advisory boards that support specific functions across the organization.

Our goal is to empower staff in different roles to use AI more effectively, reliably, and safely‚Äîoptimizing tasks, improving decision-making, and standardizing high-quality outputs.

Responsibilities:

‚Ä¢	Deliver training on:
o	How to write high-quality, effective prompts
o	How to structure multi-step prompts for consistent outputs
o	How to set up and customize ‚ÄúAI advisory boards‚Äù tailored to specific roles

‚Ä¢	Create templates, examples, and SOPs for:
o	Business Assistants (BAs)
o	Executive Assistants (EAs)
o	Customer Service Representatives (CSRs)
o	Paralegals
o	Accountants
o	Insurance sector staff (claims, underwriting, customer support, etc.)

‚Ä¢	Optimize current prompts and advisory board frameworks used internally.

‚Ä¢	Provide hands-on guidance to help team members incorporate AI into their day-to-day workflows.

‚Ä¢	Offer best practices on safety, compliance, and responsible use.

Qualifications:
‚Ä¢	Proven experience as an AI Trainer, Prompt Engineer, AI Consultant.
‚Ä¢	Ability to break down complex AI concepts into clear, practical lessons.
‚Ä¢	Demonstrated experience designing prompts for role-based workflows.
‚Ä¢	Strong understanding of at least one major LLM platform (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.).
‚Ä¢	Experience in one or more of the target fields is a plus (BA, EA, CSR, legal, accounting, insurance).
‚Ä¢	Excellent communication and documentation skills.

jobs.title: U Chat AI Assistant Developer
jobs.shortDescription:
AI Bot Builder for Dealership Demo (UChat Required)

We‚Äôre looking for an AI developer who can help us build a high-ROI demo bot for car dealerships using UChat. The goal isn‚Äôt to build a full product yet‚Äîjust a strong demo that shows all the most useful, revenue-generating features that dealerships love 

If you know how to make a bot that feels conversational, guides customers naturally, and actually produces real leads, this is for you.

What You‚Äôll Be Building

A clean demo that shows off the top features dealerships care about, including:

Smart lead generation
Conversational flow that feels human, asks the right questions, and captures name/number/email without feeling pushy.

Vehicle scenario understanding
The bot should handle buyers, trade-ins, financing questions, service requests, and vehicle availability.

Inventory search simulation
A simplified version is fine‚Äîjust enough to show the bot understands trims, budgets, body types, etc.

Trade-in mini-app
Bot can ask the basics: year, make, model, mileage, condition ‚Üí then offer a rough estimate or ‚Äúwe‚Äôll review it.‚Äù

Finance/payment conversation
Simple ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs your budget?‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs what you can expect monthly.‚Äù Doesn‚Äôt need a full calculator, just logic.

Appointment scheduling
Test drive or service booking flow that ends in a solid lead.

Lead routing
Send leads to email or webhook so we can show it connects to CRMs.

Basically: a simple but powerful dealership sales assistant that shows the best stuff quickly.

What We Need From You

Strong experience building conversational flows in UChat

Ability to make the bot feel natural, not scripted

Understanding of dealership sales flow is a big plus( we can assist in this)

Can build clean logic for different customer types (buyer, trade-in, service)

Able to work fast and produce a smooth demo experience


About the Project

This is demo-first ‚Äî not a full SaaS platform yet

Focus on impressing dealers with the high-ROI features

Should run on website, web chat(facebook, instagram) but SMS/Messenger experience is a bonus

Short-term contract with potential for longer-term work

How to Apply

Send:

Any UChat bots you‚Äôve built

Your experience with dealership or sales bots (if any)

 How long you think the demo will take

jobs.title: AI Voice Agent SaaS Platform Development
jobs.shortDescription:
I'm looking for a highly skilled technical lead, you may bring 1‚Äì2 additional engineers, to build a complete AI Voice Agent SaaS platform. This is an enterprise-level product with a very large and clearly defined scope.
You MUST review the attached PDF for the full technical requirements before applying.

The platform includes every major module of a modern telephony + AI automation system, including:

Core Requirements (High-Level)

Multi-Tenant SaaS Architecture:
Isolated tenant environments, RBAC (Owner/Admin/Agent/Viewer), API key generation, Super Admin dashboard.
(Full details in the PDF ‚Äî Tenant Onboarding, Role Management, Tenant Data Isolation)

AI Voice Agents:
Real-time STT ‚Üí LLM ‚Üí TTS pipeline, AI model configuration, voice tuning, knowledge base uploads (files/URLs/text), ‚ÄúFix AI Response‚Äù simulation mode, multilingual support (English + Arabic dialects).


Telephony & Voice Engine:
Twilio/SIP integration, inbound/outbound calls, voicemail detection, AI‚ÜîHuman & AI‚ÜîAI transfers, silence/no-speech logic, sentiment detection, fallback vendor logic, real-time streaming.


Calendar & Scheduling:
Google/Outlook API integration, booking/rescheduling, time zone awareness, conflict detection.

Outbound Campaigns:
CSV/XLS batch calling, retries, scheduling, test calls.

Call History & Analytics:
Transcripts, audio player, cost breakdown, sentiment graph, performance metrics, real-time call dashboard.

Billing System:
Stripe subscription + usage-based billing, credit wallet, invoices, overage alerts.


Automation:
Zapier integration, API integrations, animated workflow builder (drag-and-drop), transfer rule editor.

Email Automation:
Gmail/Outlook/SMTP via OAuth2, templates, tracking.

WhatsApp Integration:
Two-way messaging, reminders, notifications, compliance.

Security & Compliance:
End-to-end encryption, AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit, AWS KMS key management, GDPR-aligned handling.


Tech Stack Expected

React.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Twilio, WebRTC, Whisper, OpenAI, ElevenLabs, WhatsApp Business API, AWS.

What I Expect From You

Must have hands-on experience with Twilio Media Streams, SIP REFER, and real-time STT‚ÜíLLM‚ÜíTTS pipelines.

Proven experience delivering full SaaS platforms .

Experience with real-time telephony, STT/TTS, LLM integration, event-driven systems.

Ability to deliver structured milestones according to the scope in the PDF.

Clear communication, architectural planning, and clean code.

This project is milestone-based, fixed scope. Hourly-only applicants will be rejected.

Please answer each screening question with detailed, technical explanations. Generic or shallow answers will not be considered. Do NOT answer with ‚ÄòNDA prevents me from sharing details.‚Äô If you cannot describe your work technically, you do not qualify.

jobs.title:
AI Content Engineer (RAG + Claude + n8n)
(With Mandatory Video Introduction)
jobs.shortDescription:
We are building an internal AI Content System that automates idea sourcing, rewriting, hook generation, scoring, RAG retrieval, and video creation.
This role requires someone who can architect the entire pipeline end-to-end with clean logic, predictable structure, and future scalability.

We are looking for someone who understands RAG, Claude Skills, and workflow engineering.

About the Role
We already have multiple automations running (TikTok scraping, script generation, Airtable pipelines, HeyGen automation). The next step is to connect everything into a central intelligence layer that:
	1.	Collects competitor content daily
	2.	Transcribes, translates, and rewrites scripts
	3.	Generates hooks in our brand voice
	4.	Stores everything in Airtable and a vector DB
	5.	Retrieves high-performing examples using RAG
	6.	Scores ideas using custom logic (FOMO, tension, business value)
	7.	Creates a feedback loop based on performance
	8.	Connects to a Claude Skill that rewrites scripts with our style
	9.	Runs all logic reliably inside Make or n8n

The engineer will handle architecture, setup, integration, and documentation.

‚∏ª

Responsibilities
	1.	Architect the entire pipeline with clean end-to-end data flow
	2.	Build competitor content ingestion via Apify or similar scrapers
	3.	Implement transcription, translation, and script rewriting
	4.	Generate hooks using Claude or custom logic
	5.	Store scripts, hooks, and metadata in Airtable
	6.	Build a RAG layer
	7.	Implement scoring logic for idea ranking
	8.	Build feedback loops using performance metrics
	9.	Connect everything to Claude Skills for consistent style and tone
	10.	Document the entire system for future scaling

‚∏ª

Required Skills
	1.	Experience building RAG pipelines (embeddings, retrieval, metadata)
	2.	Experience with Claude Skills and structured prompting
	3.	Proficiency with n8n or Make
	4.	Experience with vector databases (Relevance AI or Pinecone)
	5.	API integration experience (Apify, HeyGen, etc.)
	6.	Airtable schema design
	7.	Ability to build scoring systems
	8.	Clean, modular architecture with error handling and logging

‚∏ª

Bonus Skills
	1.	Experience building content intelligence or automation systems
	2.	Familiarity with TikTok or Instagram scraping
	3.	Experience with content performance analytics
	4.	Understanding of hook psychology and idea ranking logic

‚∏ª

Mandatory Application Step
Please record a short 1‚Äì2 minute video introducing yourself and your relevant experience with RAG, Claude Skills, n8n/Make, vector databases, and content automation.

You can upload the video anywhere (YouTube unlisted, Loom, Google Drive, etc.) and include the link in your proposal.

Thank you 

Abdallah

jobs.title: Proofreader/Editor for AI-Assisted French‚ÜíEnglish Book Translation (135,000 words)
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
I am looking for a skilled English proofreader/editor to revise a full book translation (approx. 135,000 words). The text will first be translated using DeepL to reduce costs, and I will provide a glossary, context notes, and style expectations to ensure consistency.

Your role is not to translate from scratch, but to:

Carefully proofread and edit the AI-generated translation

Correct grammar, punctuation, semantic errors, and unnatural phrasing

Ensure tone, flow, and readability appropriate for a book

Verify meaning against the French original if something feels off

Apply glossary terms consistently

Identify any sections that need re-phrasing or clarification

What I‚Äôm looking for:

Native or near-native English level

Good understanding of French (to check original meaning)

Experience with literary editing, book proofreading, or translation

Ability to improve style while respecting the author‚Äôs voice

Someone reliable, communicative, and efficient with large manuscripts

Project details:

Manuscript length: ~135k words

Estimated reading time: ~14 hours

Budget: ‚Ç¨700 total

Deadline: ideally 4‚Äì6 weeks, but flexible

Delivery: Google Docs or Word with tracked changes

This project is ideal for freelancers comfortable working with AI-assisted translations who enjoy polishing long-form content into a natural and engaging final version.

Please include in your proposal:

A short bio or relevant experience

A sample of prior editing or translation work (if available)

Your estimated timeline

Thank you ‚Äî I look forward to finding a great collaborator for this project!

jobs.title: AI Voice Bot Development with PBX Integration
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
We need an experienced developer to build an AI-powered Voice Bot that integrates directly with our PBX system to handle real-time phone calls with customers. The goal is to automate conversations, collect information, verify customer identity, and provide guided responses‚Äîsimilar to a call-center virtual agent.

Scope of Work

The final solution must include:

1. Voice Bot (AI Assistant)
	‚Ä¢	Natural, human-like conversation using an LLM (OpenAI, Deepgram, AssemblyAI, or similar).
	‚Ä¢	Real-time speech-to-text (STT) and text-to-speech (TTS).
	‚Ä¢	Ability to recognize intent, answer questions, and follow conversation flows.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to trigger internal actions (e.g., send data to our backend, fetch customer info, update status).

2. PBX Integration

Our PBX allows SIP/VoIP integration. The bot must be able to:
	‚Ä¢	Receive inbound calls routed from our PBX.
	‚Ä¢	Make outbound calls if needed.
	‚Ä¢	Maintain stable real-time audio streaming (WebRTC, SIP, RTP).
	‚Ä¢	Detect DTMF signals if required.
	‚Ä¢	Log call results.

3. Backend Integration

We provide a backend with customer data.
The bot must:
	‚Ä¢	Fetch customer info using API (REST/JSON).
	‚Ä¢	Update conversation status during or after the call.
	‚Ä¢	Send structured data (JSON) back to our backend.

4. Core Features Required
	‚Ä¢	Real-time bi-directional audio streaming.
	‚Ä¢	Transcription with high accuracy (Spanish Chile preferred).
	‚Ä¢	Conversation memory during the call.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to follow a defined flow (gather data ‚Üí validate ‚Üí escalate).
	‚Ä¢	Failover logic (if bot doesn‚Äôt understand, escalate to human agent).
	‚Ä¢	Call recording (optional).
	‚Ä¢	Multi-user support.

5. Additional Details
	‚Ä¢	Language: Spanish (Chile).
	‚Ä¢	Bot must be accessible via mobile and landline calls.
	‚Ä¢	High reliability, optimized for low latency.
	‚Ä¢	Must work seamlessly with the PBX routing rules.
	‚Ä¢	We will provide sample call flows and scripts.

‚∏ª

üéØ What We Will Provide
	‚Ä¢	Our PBX connection details (SIP/VoIP/WebRTC endpoint).
	‚Ä¢	Backend API endpoints.
	‚Ä¢	Example scripts and business logic.
	‚Ä¢	A test phone number for calls.

‚∏ª

üîß Preferred Technologies (Not mandatory)

Experience with any of these is a plus:
	‚Ä¢	PBX: Asterisk, FreePBX, Issabel, Genesys, Cisco, or custom SIP provider.
	‚Ä¢	AI/Voice frameworks:
	‚Ä¢	Twilio Media Streams
	‚Ä¢	Deepgram Live / Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	OpenAI Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	AssemblyAI Realtime
	‚Ä¢	VAPI.dev
	‚Ä¢	Voiceflow
	‚Ä¢	Protocols: SIP, RTP, WebRTC.
	‚Ä¢	Backend: Python/Node.js preferred.

‚∏ª

üìå Deliverables
	1.	Fully working voice bot integrated with our PBX.
	2.	API connection with our backend.
	3.	Documentation (installation + architecture).
	4.	Test cases + example calls.
	5.	Source code repo (GitHub/GitLab).

‚∏ª

üßë‚Äçüíª Required Experience
	‚Ä¢	Strong knowledge in VoIP/PBX (SIP, RTP, Asterisk, etc.)
	‚Ä¢	Experience building voice bots or conversational AI.
	‚Ä¢	Experience integrating real-time audio streaming with AI models.
	‚Ä¢	Proven record of similar past work on Upwork.

‚∏ª

‚è±Ô∏è Timeline

We expect delivery in 2‚Äì4 weeks once the project begins.

jobs.title: Virtual Assistant Needed for Business Rebuilding
jobs.shortDescription: I am looking for a highly organized and proactive Virtual Assistant to help me rebuild my business, which has been established since 2014. The ideal candidate will assist with managing emails, bookkeeping, creating standard operating procedures (SOPs), and formulating a solid business plan and vision. Additionally, experience in applying AI solutions to streamline processes will be a plus. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone with a strategic mindset and the ability to implement effective systems for growth. The area of my work is Piling/ground engineering. I need a certain 3 days a week where I can allocate certain tasks and a platform where I can send a voice note explaining my day, what can be improved with a solution/more questions the following day

jobs.title: YouTube Screencast & AI Voice Sync Specialist (Healthcare Education Content)
jobs.shortDescription:
Project-Based | Ongoing Work Available

About All Healthcare Careers (AHC)
üëâ https://allhealthcarecareers.com/
AHC helps future nurses and CNAs pass their exams through practice tests, flashcards, videos, and simple, clear explainer content. You can see our YouTube channel here:
üëâ https://www.youtube.com/@allhealthcarecareers

Before applying, please review several recent AHC YouTube videos to understand the exact screencast style, pacing, slide transitions, and overall simplicity we expect.
‚ö†Ô∏è Ignore intros and outros‚Äîfocus on the educational screencast portion only.

‚∏ª

Project Overview

We produce educational YouTube videos based on Google Slide decks. We need a contractor to help streamline and scale our content production workflow across three core steps: slide deck prep ‚Üí AI script prep ‚Üí screencast recording.

1. Update & Reorganize Slide Decks
	‚Ä¢	Re-order slides using an extension such as Randomize Slides by Alice Keeler (based on existing slide decks we provide) (future opportunity to create new slide decks from different question/answer sets)
	‚Ä¢	Update slide numbers to match the new order (same content, new sequence).
	‚Ä¢	Make small text formatting edits only (NOT content edits‚Äîunless something looks incorrect, in which case ask before changing anything)

2. Prepare a Clean Script for AI Voice

Extract all slide text into a script and adjust for natural AI speech:
	‚Ä¢	Convert ALL CAPS to sentence case
	‚Ä¢	Replace symbols with spoken equivalents (e.g., ‚Äú=‚Äù ‚Üí ‚Äúequals‚Äù)
	‚Ä¢	Remove awkward breaks
	‚Ä¢	Ensure the script flows smoothly for narration

Generate the AI speech via Adobe Firefly (Generate Speech feature). 

3. Record a Screencast Synced to the Script
	‚Ä¢	Record a screencast of the slides in Google Slides presenter mode
	‚Ä¢	Minimum output specs:
	‚Ä¢	1280√ó720 (HD)
	‚Ä¢	4K/60 FPS preferred
	‚Ä¢	Using Bandicam, OBS, or your tool of choice (as long as quality is comparable)
	‚Ä¢	Perfectly sync slide changes to the prepared script (timing and pacing matter)
	‚Ä¢	Keep transitions smooth and consistent with the examples on our channel

‚∏ª

Deliverables
	‚Ä¢	Updated Google Slide deck (reordered, renumbered)
	‚Ä¢	Cleaned-up AI narration script (Google Doc)
	‚Ä¢	Final MP4 video(s)
	‚Ä¢	Ideally 1 MP4 per full deck
	‚Ä¢	But delivering every 10 slides as a separate MP4 is acceptable if needed for AI voice length restrictions

‚∏ª

Ideal Candidate
	‚Ä¢	Strong screencasting experience
	‚Ä¢	Excellent attention to detail (especially timing/sync)
	‚Ä¢	Comfortable editing text for clarity and readability
	‚Ä¢	Experience with Adobe Firefly AI voice or similar tools (helpful but not required)
	‚Ä¢	Bonus: familiarity with healthcare or educational content

‚∏ª

To Apply

Please submit:
	1.	1‚Äì2 screencast examples showing synced narration or slide walkthroughs
	2.	A brief note confirming you reviewed recent AHC videos and understand the required style
	3.	Your proposed rate (per completed video or hourly)
	4.	Your typical turnaround time

jobs.title: Looking for a YouTube Documentary-Style Video Editor (Faceless, Cinematic, 10-Min Videos)
jobs.shortDescription:
Looking for a YouTube Documentary-Style Video Editor (Faceless, Cinematic, 10-Min Videos)

Descripci√≥n:

I‚Äôm building a faceless YouTube documentary channel (in English) focused on:
future of wealth, AI, crypto, real assets, macro trends, psychology of systems, and global patterns.

I‚Äôm looking for a long-term video editor who can produce 1 high-quality 8‚Äì12 minute video per week, with a visual style similar to:

ColdFusion

Aperture

Moon

DW Documentary (short format)

James Jani (without characters)

MagnatesMedia (minimalist version)

IMPORTANT:
This is NOT TikTok editing, NOT wedding editing, NOT corporate slideshow editing.
I need someone who understands documentary-style storytelling, pacing, and cinematic visuals.

What I will provide:

complete script (1,500‚Äì2,000 words)

voiceover (AI voice from ElevenLabs)

a basic scene-by-scene outline

any specific reference footage if needed

What you need to do:

edit a full 10-minute YouTube documentary

mix stock footage (Storyblocks/Artgrid/Pexels HD)

integrate light motion graphics (maps, lines, charts, minimal animations)

add music + sound design

add on-screen text and subtitles when needed

include occasional AI-generated clips (I can provide them or you can generate them)

maintain a premium, cinematic, minimalist tone
deliver weekly

Requirements (NON-NEGOTIABLE):

proven experience editing YouTube faceless/documentary/explainer videos

strong portfolio with examples similar to ColdFusion/Aperture

ability to work with voiceover-based videos

ability to select high-quality stock footage

clean, modern, minimalist editing style

weekly availability

attention to narrative flow and pacing

Nice to have (not mandatory):

experience editing videos about tech, finance, AI or macroeconomics

ability to create simple data animations

use of DaVinci Resolve, Adobe Premiere or Final Cut

access to Storyblocks, Artgrid or Envato Elements

Scope and Budget:

I will start with 1 paid test video (8‚Äì10 minutes).
If the work fits the style, this will become a long-term weekly job.

Budget per video:
USD 60‚Äì150, depending on your level and portfolio.

To apply (required):

Please send me:

3‚Äì5 links to videos you edited that match the style described
(documentary, faceless, cinematic, tech/macro/AI preferred).

A quick explanation of your workflow.

Your availability per week.

Your rate per 8‚Äì12 minute video.

Applications without matching samples will not be considered.

Goal:
Build a premium, faceless YouTube channel with consistent weekly uploads, elegant visuals and deep, cinematic storytelling.

jobs.title: GoHighLevel Automation & Tech Setup Expert for Info-Business Funnels (Long-Term | Fixed or Hourly)
jobs.shortDescription:
JOB DESCRIPTION:
I‚Äôm looking for a high-level GoHighLevel automation & tech specialist for long-term collaboration across two brands (construction + online education).
This is not a basic funnel builder role ‚Äî I need someone who understands full funnel operations, attribution tracking, automations, call tracking, and technical setup at a professional level.

If you are not highly experienced with GoHighLevel at a deep automation/tech level ‚Äî please do not apply.

About the Brands
‚Ä¢ Craftex ‚Äî 7-figure construction & design company in the UK
‚Ä¢ BizMentor ‚Äî online education + high-ticket mentorship brand

We run VSL funnels, booking funnels, SMS/email automations, retargeting flows, outbound setters, and paid ads.
I need someone who can own the entire technical side.

Current Priority Tasks (THIS is what you will do first):

Facebook Ads ‚Üí Funnel Attribution Setup
I need analytics showing, for each separate video ad:
‚Äì how many leads came from each video
‚Äì how many calls were booked
‚Äì how many calls were attended
‚Äì how many sales were closed
Metrics required:
‚Äì Cost per Lead
‚Äì Cost per Booked Qualified Call
‚Äì Cost per Call Attended
‚Äì Cost per Sale

WA Bot Setup
‚Äì Build a WA follow-up bot to book strategy sessions after a lead opts in.

Fix Email Deliverability
‚Äì Emails currently land in Promotions.
‚Äì I need the technical setup fixed (warmup, authentication, routing, etc.).

Outbound Setter Call Tracking System
Set up proper tracking inside GHL for:
‚Äì Calls dialed
‚Äì Calls answered
‚Äì Time on the phone
‚Äì Calls set for a Discovery Session
‚Äì Calls that showed up
‚Äì Calls closed (paid in full, deposit, declined)

Voice AI Immediate Lead Call
‚Äì Set up and test Voice AI calling leads immediately.
‚Äì Advise if GoHighLevel‚Äôs current AI is good enough or if we need an external solution.

After these tasks
This is a long-term position.
Your ongoing responsibilities will include:
‚Äì Maintaining all funnels and automations
‚Äì Fixing bugs, logic issues, tagging, routing
‚Äì Improving conversion rates across steps
‚Äì Improving email deliverability
‚Äì Building additional funnels when needed
‚Äì Ensuring everything runs smoothly daily
‚Äì Full system oversight for both brands

This is NOT a one-time project.

Requirements
(short, strict, high-level ‚Äî only professionals will apply)

‚Ä¢ Expert-level GoHighLevel automation & technical setup experience
‚Ä¢ Understanding of info-business funnels (VSL ‚Üí nurture ‚Üí book call ‚Üí show up ‚Üí close)
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of tracking, attribution, Zapier integrations, logic, tags
‚Ä¢ Experience with WhatsApp automation
‚Ä¢ Strong English
‚Ä¢ Long-term mindset & reliability

How to Apply

Start your proposal with your hourly rate or monthly rate.
To apply, please include:
- A short Loom video (2‚Äì5 minutes) where you walk through your relevant experience with similar tasks ‚Äî funnel setup, automations, tracking, WhatsApp flows, email deliverability, booking/show-up systems, etc. You can use examples you already have, demo accounts, or blurred client data. The goal is simply to understand your real experience and how you solve similar problems.
- A brief written summary of your experience with info-business / high-ticket mentorship funnels.
- Your weekly availability and when you can start.
- Confirmation that you can handle the tasks listed in the job description.

jobs.title: TikTok Video Editor (Dropshipping Ads)
jobs.shortDescription:
We run multiple EU dropshipping stores + we are an Agency and produce TikTok ads every day.

We‚Äôre looking for 3 reliable TikTok video editors who can follow a proven structure and deliver fast, clean, conversion-focused edits.

This is an execution role:
you follow our framework, select the right clip order, write a short script, and add an AI voice-over.

No cinematic editing.
No heavy After Effects work.
Just fast, high-output TikTok ads that convert.

üîß Your Daily Tasks
- Edit TikTok ads in CapCut (mobile or desktop).
- Select the correct clip sequence based on benefits and logic.
- Write short ad scripts (3‚Äì6 lines) with a strong hook.
- Add a natural AI voice-over using ElevenLabs.
- Create variations for scaling product for creative testing.
- Follow our Hook ‚Üí Benefit ‚Üí Proof ‚Üí CTA structure.
- Deliver daily updates and files on time.

üö® Production Requirements (Mandatory)
1. Output Standard
You must deliver 3 complete TikTok ads per hour.
(Every hour = 3 full creatives finished)

2. Billable Time Rules
Only active editing time is paid.

NOT billable:
- waiting for feedback
- rendering
- downloading/uploading
- communication delays
- idle time

If you cannot maintain fast, consistent output, this role is not a match.

‚úÖ Requirements
- Experience editing TikTok ads (dropshipping preferred).
- Strong CapCut skills.
- Ability to write simple, high-impact scripts.
- Understand scroll-stoppers, pacing, retention, and TikTok ad psychology.
- Knows how to make different variations of the same video.
- Able to use ElevenLabs for AI voice-overs (easy to learn).
- Reliable, structured, and available 6‚Äì8 hours per day.
- Consistent output and ability to follow SOPs.

üí∞ Salary:
$6‚Äì$8 per hour
Long-term position + performance bonuses after consistent delivery.

üìå How to Apply:
Start your message with ‚ÄúEditor‚Äù ‚Äî applications without this will be ignored.

Send the following:
- 3 TikTok ads you‚Äôve edited (dropshipping preferred)
- A short explanation of how you choose the hook angle

Confirmation that you:
- can work full-time
- accept $6‚Äì$8/hour
- can produce 3 ads per hour

If selected, you will receive one simple test task.
Pass the test ‚Üí you‚Äôre hired immediately.

üíº About Us
We run several high-performing EU dropshipping stores / Agency and scale aggressively through TikTok Ads. Our workflow is simple, structured, and fast. We give you everything you need, you just execute.
jobs.fullDescription:
SummaryWe run multiple EU dropshipping stores + we are an Agency and produce TikTok ads every day.

We‚Äôre looking for 3 reliable TikTok video editors who can follow a proven structure and deliver fast, clean, conversion-focused edits.

This is an execution role:
you follow our framework, select the right clip order, write a short script, and add an AI voice-over.

No cinematic editing.
No heavy After Effects work.
Just fast, high-output TikTok ads that convert.

üîß Your Daily Tasks
- Edit TikTok ads in CapCut (mobile or desktop).
- Select the correct clip sequence based on benefits and logic.
- Write short ad scripts (3‚Äì6 lines) with a strong hook.
- Add a natural AI voice-over using ElevenLabs.
- Create variations for scaling product for creative testing.
- Follow our Hook ‚Üí Benefit ‚Üí Proof ‚Üí CTA structure.
- Deliver daily updates and files on time.

üö® Production Requirements (Mandatory)
1. Output Standard
You must deliver 3 complete TikTok ads per hour.
(Every hour = 3 full creatives finished)

2. Billable Time Rules
Only active editing time is paid.

NOT billable:
- waiting for feedback
- rendering
- downloading/uploading
- communication delays
- idle time

If you cannot maintain fast, consistent output, this role is not a match.

‚úÖ Requirements
- Experience editing TikTok ads (dropshipping preferred).
- Strong CapCut skills.
- Ability to write simple, high-impact scripts.
- Understand scroll-stoppers, pacing, retention, and TikTok ad psychology.
- Knows how to make different variations of the same video.
- Able to use ElevenLabs for AI voice-overs (easy to learn).
- Reliable, structured, and available 6‚Äì8 hours per day.
- Consistent output and ability to follow SOPs.

üí∞ Salary:
$6‚Äì$8 per hour
Long-term position + performance bonuses after consistent delivery.

üìå How to Apply:
Start your message with ‚ÄúEditor‚Äù ‚Äî applications without this will be ignored.

Send the following:
- 3 TikTok ads you‚Äôve edited (dropshipping preferred)
- A short explanation of how you choose the hook angle

Confirmation that you:
- can work full-time
- accept $6‚Äì$8/hour
- can produce 3 ads per hour

If selected, you will receive one simple test task.
Pass the test ‚Üí you‚Äôre hired immediately.

üíº About Us
We run several high-performing EU dropshipping stores / Agency and scale aggressively through TikTok Ads. Our workflow is simple, structured, and fast. We give you everything you need, you just execute.

jobs.title: Meta Tags Reviewer/Optimizer
jobs.shortDescription:
We‚Äôre looking for a detail-oriented specialist to review, refine, and optimize the meta titles and descriptions across our website. The ideal candidate has excellent English writing skills and a strong understanding of SEO best practices. Your role is to craft clear, compelling, and conversion-focused meta tags that not only improve search visibility but also entice users to click through from Google search results. Responsibilities include auditing existing tags, rewriting them for maximum clarity and impact, and ensuring consistency with our brand voice and goals.

You DO NOT need to do keyword research, and you don't need to write these meta tags from scratch.   We will provide you with the meta tags that we have already written, and you'll review and edit them as needed.

IMPORTANT: ALL CONTENT TO BE MANUALLY/HUMAN WRITTEN ONLY.  NO AI CONTENT.  NO USING AI OR OTHER TOOLS.  

Thank you!

jobs.title: Looking for X/Twitter/Linkedin Content Researcher + Writer (Founder Voice, Medtech/Healthtech)
jobs.shortDescription:
I‚Äôm a founder in the medical device / neurotech space looking for someone to help improve my presence on X/Twitter and LinkedIn. I‚Äôm not looking for generic marketing content. I want short, thoughtful, high-signal writing in a clean founder voice. A.I. can help you with ideation but the final content should do it's best to sound as realistic as possible.

This role is part research, part writing, and part understanding how founders communicate online.

What you‚Äôll help with
X / Twitter:

- Finding recent, relevant posts I can reply to (founders, investors, medtech, neurotech, AI-health, clinicians, MS/stroke, movement science)

- Drafting non-cringe, concise reply options in my tone (short, thoughtful, clean)

- Drafting 1‚Äì2 tweet ideas per week based on my themes:

gait / movement intelligence

neurotech

MS/stroke rehab

building an FDA-cleared device

founder lessons/fundraising

healthcare/AI realism

Light research on trending conversations in my niche

LinkedIn:

LinkedIn requires a different writing style than X and will have more of a focus on attracting engagement from corporate partners. You must know how to adapt ideas between platforms.

- Turning X ideas into longer, more structured LinkedIn posts

- Turning LinkedIn insights into tight, punchy X posts

- Writing in the same founder voice but with:

more context

more narrative clarity

more professionalism

no memes or unnecessary banter

Understanding what performs on each platform (X = signal + conversation, LinkedIn = story + insight)

This is not a ‚Äúcopy/paste between platforms‚Äù role, it‚Äôs about adapting tone and structure.

What I‚Äôm NOT looking for:

Marketing fluff

Hashtag spam

Motivational/guru content

Corporate or overly formal voice

Emoji-heavy or cringe tone

Automation/bots or template replies

AI-sounding writing with no nuance

Copy/paste content across platforms

Ideal candidate:

Excellent English

Strong short-form writing ability

Able to match a founder‚Äôs tone (concise, thoughtful, non-cringe)

Understands tech, startups, and ideally some healthcare

Has examples of founder-style writing or social content

Comfortable iterating quickly and taking feedback

Works on US or overlapping time zones (preferred)

Before hiring:

I‚Äôll ask for:

Writing samples, and

A small paid test (replying to a few example posts + drafting 2 LinkedIn/X post ideas).

If the tone matches what I‚Äôm aiming for, this can become an ongoing weekly role.

jobs.title: Noble Steel Co. Content Creator (Short-Form Video)
jobs.shortDescription:
Overview

We‚Äôre a fast-growing metal-building company creating modern, educational content around a legacy industry. We want a creator who can take raw ideas‚Äîtopics, insights, simple photos‚Äîand turn them into engaging short-form videos without needing us to hand over full video footage.

Think: Wolf Steel, but with our own voice and angle.

Your job is to make metal buildings interesting, clear, and scroll-stopping using sourced footage, stock, animations, graphic overlays, or clever editing.

‚∏ª

What You‚Äôll Be Creating

We‚Äôll give you:
	‚Ä¢	Topic ideas
	‚Ä¢	Concepts
	‚Ä¢	Insights from the industry
	‚Ä¢	Directions on what matters to customers

You‚Äôll turn that into:
	‚Ä¢	2 high-quality short-form videos per week
	‚Ä¢	20‚Äì40 seconds each
	‚Ä¢	Educational, modern, high-retention edits

Example themes:
	‚Ä¢	Cost breakdowns
	‚Ä¢	Mistakes to avoid
	‚Ä¢	Carport vs. garage
	‚Ä¢	Build timelines
	‚Ä¢	Walkthroughs using photos + AI visuals
	‚Ä¢	‚ÄúWhat to look for in a quote‚Äù
	‚Ä¢	Showcase videos using curated footage + overlays

You‚Äôre building the content itself, not just editing what we send you.

‚∏ª

Ideal Candidate

Someone who:
	‚Ä¢	Can research a topic and build a compelling script
	‚Ä¢	Knows how to source footage (stock, creative commons, AI visuals, etc.)
	‚Ä¢	Has modern editing skills and understands what performs
	‚Ä¢	Can turn construction/metal buildings into clean, minimalist, authoritative videos
	‚Ä¢	Understands hooks, pacing, retention, and scroll psychology

Bonus if you can:
	‚Ä¢	Use voiceover or AI voice
	‚Ä¢	Create simple animations or diagram overlays
	‚Ä¢	Build a content style that feels consistent week-to-week

‚∏ª

Examples of the Content Style We Want

Please reference:
Wolf Steel Buildings ‚Äî YouTube Shorts

Not to copy‚Äîjust to understand the pace, clarity, and modern feel.

‚∏ª

What We Provide
	‚Ä¢	Clear topics each week
	‚Ä¢	Direction and insights from our sales experience
	‚Ä¢	Our brand voice + hook style
	‚Ä¢	Photos of projects (when available)

Everything else‚Äîcreative sourcing, editing, scripting‚Äîis on you.

‚∏ª

Deliverables
	‚Ä¢	2 short-form videos per week (Reels/TikTok/Shorts format)
	‚Ä¢	Captions + hashtags (optional but appreciated)
	‚Ä¢	Consistent style and high engagement

‚∏ª

Budget

Open to:
	‚Ä¢	Per-video rates
	‚Ä¢	Weekly retainer
	‚Ä¢	Monthly retainer

We care most about quality + consistency.

‚∏ª

How to Apply

Please include:
	1.	Examples of short-form videos you created from scratch
	2.	Any experience in construction, real estate, architecture, or similar
	3.	Your rate
	4.	How you source footage
	5.	Turnaround time

jobs.title: SEO Content & Publishing Virtual Assistant for Luxury E-commerce
jobs.shortDescription:
JOB DESCRIPTION ‚Äî SEO Content & Publishing VA (E-Commerce Brand)

Company: E-Commerce Brand (Design-Led)
Location: Remote
Hours: ~20 hrs/week (scales with output)
Start Date: Immediate

About the Role

We are hiring a highly detail-oriented SEO Content & Publishing VA to support our SEO Avalanche content strategy. This role focuses on producing keyword-optimised articles using AI tools, formatting them to a premium standard, uploading them to Shopify, and maintaining consistency across all content.

This is not a creative writing role ‚Äî AI + templates handle the majority of the writing.
Your role is execution, formatting, optimisation, publishing support, and quality control.

Role Overview

‚úì Create SEO-optimised blog articles using AI tools and provided templates
‚úì Format content consistently to match our premium, editorial style
‚úì Upload articles to Shopify (Draft mode)
‚úì Add internal links, meta descriptions, and alt text
‚úì Source high-quality, aesthetic-aligned images
‚úì Follow strict tone-of-voice and formatting guidelines
‚úì Build topical clusters using the SEO Avalanche method

Responsibilities
SEO Content Creation

‚úì Produce SEO-optimised blog posts using provided titles + keywords
‚úì Use AI writing tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude) based on instructions
‚úì Implement correct semantic structure (H1, H2, H3)
‚úì Apply internal linking strategy
‚úì Maintain keyword placement and readability (no keyword stuffing)

Content Formatting & Publishing

‚úì Upload content to Shopify Blog (Draft mode)
‚úì Add high-quality, brand-aligned imagery (training provided)
‚úì Add alt text, meta titles, and meta descriptions using templates
‚úì Assign correct tags + categories for SEO clusters

Image Support

‚úì Source minimalist, editorial-style imagery (training provided)
‚úì Resize/compress images for web performance
‚úì Maintain stylistic consistency across all published content

Quality Assurance

‚úì Check grammar, structure, internal links, and consistency
‚úì Ensure articles follow our premium editorial tone
‚úì Run plagiarism checks using provided tools

Documentation & Reporting

‚úì Update the content tracker daily
‚úì Follow SOPs with accuracy and consistency
‚úì Communicate progress clearly and reliably

Skills Required
Must-Have

‚úì Experience as an SEO VA or Content VA
‚úì Strong English reading and writing skills
‚úì Familiarity with AI writing tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude)
‚úì Good eye for clean formatting and layout
‚úì Basic understanding of SEO (keywords, metadata, internal links)
‚úì Experience with Shopify (or fast learner)
‚úì Ability to follow step-by-step SOPs consistently
‚úì Reliable communication and responsiveness

Nice-to-Have (Training Provided)

‚úì Experience with Canva or basic image editing
‚úì Basic keyword research
‚úì Experience in home, lifestyle, interiors, or design niches
‚úì Familiarity with Surfer SEO (optional)
‚úì Experience using Google Sheets / Microsoft Excel

What We Provide

‚úì Full training on the SEO Avalanche method
‚úì Article structure templates
‚úì Tone-of-voice guidelines
‚úì Internal link map
‚úì SOPs for writing, formatting, optimisation, and publishing
‚úì AI prompt templates
‚úì A 50-article content calendar
‚úì Long-term work for the right candidate
‚úì Supportive, organised work environment

Who This Role Is Perfect For

‚úì A reliable VA who enjoys structured, repeatable tasks
‚úì Someone who likes using AI tools and working with clear frameworks
‚úì A detail-oriented executor who takes pride in accuracy
‚úì Someone looking for stable, ongoing work
‚úì A VA who prefers clarity, guidance, and well-defined processes

jobs.title: Generate audio dialogue lines in Mand. Chinese using Eleven Labs' TTS system + Correct.Proofreading
jobs.shortDescription:
Description
Job Mission: WonderLang is a video game designed for language learning, and I am looking for a native Mandarin Chinese speaker from China to help generate audio dialogue lines in Mandarin Chinese using Eleven Labs' TTS system.

Job Details:

You will receive a list of written dialogues along with the corresponding audio file names to generate for each dialogue line.
Voices for the characters have already been selected. Your task will be to confirm that the Mandarin Chinese version of each voice works correctly in terms of pronunciation and volume.
You must ensure that every line is spoken with the correct tone, accent, and intonation to maintain consistency across the game dialogues. It may be necessary to generate a line 3 or 4 times to get the right version.
You will need to flag any lines that do not sound correct grammatically or feel unnatural. These lines have been translated by native Mandarin Chinese speakers, but some issues may have been overlooked. You will get the context of each dialogue and should check that the level of speech (politeness) is correct for the situation. You shall also check the vocabulary used is consistant. In such cases, do not generate the audio. If you find sentences that are not correct, not natural or not a the right speech level, you shall correct them before generating the audio and record the changes in an excel folder.
Audio files must be named correctly according to the provided instructions.

Requirements:

Native Mandarin Chinese speaker from China.
Experience with TTS tools (preferably Eleven Labs) and sensitivity to the nuances of the Chinese Mandarin language (pronunciation, tone, volume, etc.).
Ability to evaluate and adjust tone and intonation to match the character‚Äôs style.
Attention to detail in checking files to ensure the quality of the dialogues.
Compensation: $0.1 per dialogue line/audio file generated. Approximately $12/hour if you work efficiently.

Additional Details:

Access to my Eleven Labs account will be provided for the task.
There are around 2500 dialogue lines in total for this project, with the possibility of continuing on a second project afterward.

First Batch: We will start with around 150 lines.

You will receive an initial list of texts (Excel file) along with instructions on which character voice to use for each line.
Generate the audio files for each dialogue line, ensuring that the tone, pronunciation, volume, and intonation are accurate.
Some lines may contain superfluous elements (tags like [br] or extra punctuation) that you will need to remove before generating the audio.

If you encounter a problematic line that sounds grammatically incorrect or unnatural, flag it instead of generating it. Once flagged, I will revise the sentence and send it back for audio generation.

Once the correct audio is obtained, save it with the corresponding name indicated in the Excel file.

jobs.title: B2B Marketing Specialist
jobs.shortDescription:
üìå Job Title:

B2B Marketing Specialist ‚Äî LinkedIn, Outbound Email, SEO-Friendly Content, & Light Website Updates

If you submit for this job, please include your favorite sport and an example of a correlation between that sport and any aspect of your work.

üìÑ JOB DESCRIPTION
Triple Advantage Group (TAG RevOps) is a 2-person RevOps consulting firm seeking a part-time B2B marketer to support LinkedIn content, outbound email campaigns, and light website updates.
We‚Äôre also focused on improving our SEO and LLM search visibility, so content should be optimized for both humans and AI-driven discovery.

Optional bonus: expertise in paid ads (LinkedIn/Google).

üíº Responsibilities
LINKEDIN (Primary)
-Create 1‚Äì2 LinkedIn posts per week in a RevOps founder‚Äôs voice
-Build simple, clean visuals (carousel posts, graphics) using Canva
-Ensure posts support SEO + LLM search optimization (keywords, topical authority, interlinked themes)
-Suggest content themes and ongoing strategy

OUTBOUND EMAIL CAMPAIGNS
-Write personalized cold email sequences (short, human, value-driven)
-Provide guidance on ICP, messaging angles, and CTAs

Optional: Build/send sequences through HubSpot or B2B Rocket

WEBSITE UPDATES (Light)
-Keep our Squarespace website fresh with occasional content/copy updates
-Ensure site structure supports SEO and topical relevance
-Ensure messaging on social aligns with website

Optional ‚Äî Paid Ads
-If experienced, help plan or manage small-scale LinkedIn or Google Ads

Nice-to-have, not required

üß† IDEAL CANDIDATE
-Strong B2B writing + storytelling skills
-Comfortable writing LinkedIn content for founders / consultants
-Experience with SEO principles or LLM-search-friendly content
-Canva expertise for clean visual posts
-Basic website skills (Squarespace or similar)

Bonus: HubSpot, outbound tools, SaaS/RevOps familiarity, paid ads knowledge

‚è±Ô∏è WORKLOAD & BUDGET
~5 hrs/week, ongoing 
~Open to hourly or fixed monthly rate.  If you can get more done in less time, I want to reward that, not punish you for working less.


Please include your rate + examples of LinkedIn posts, email outreach, or websites you‚Äôve updated.

~5 hrs/week, ongoing

jobs.title: Founding Marketing Manager (AI-Native, Full-Funnel Growth)
jobs.shortDescription:
M&A Science is carving out into its own company and building a modern, AI-powered marketing engine from the ground up. We publish a high volume of content (podcast, video, membership, learning programs, events) and now need a self-driven, full-funnel Marketing Manager who can turn that content into growth.

This is our first marketing hire- ideal for someone hungry, sharp, and ready to own the entire marketing function at an early-stage company.

If you want a role where you build the system, not inherit one, this is it.

What You‚Äôll Own (End-to-End Growth)
Own the entire funnel
- Top-funnel: paid campaigns, content distribution, targeting
- Mid-funnel: segmentation, lead capture, email nurturing
- Bottom-funnel: retargeting, membership conversion, sales support

Run campaigns
- LinkedIn, YouTube, Google, Meta
- Membership + certification launches
- Event promotion
- A/B testing audiences, copy, and offers

Email + lifecycle automation
- Newsletter
- Nurture sequences
- Behavior-based automations
- Onboarding flows
- Re-engagement campaigns

Build and optimize conversion assets
- Landing pages in Webflow
- Conversion copy across pages and funnels
- Lead magnets (checklists, frameworks, templates)
- Retargeting flows across platforms

Analytics + reporting
- Funnel performance
- Attribution
- CAC + ROAS
- Drop-off analysis
- Monthly performance summaries

Messaging + content quality
- Edit and elevate AI-assisted content
- Maintain a sharp, consistent brand voice
- Improve clarity, conversion, and narrative flow

Automation
- Collaborate on workflows in n8n
- Improve HubSpot segmentation + routing
- Identify automation gaps and fix them
- Leverage AI to speed up execution

This role is both strategic and hands-on. You‚Äôll think, build, execute, and optimize.

What Success Looks Like
In your first 60‚Äì90 days, you should be able to produce:
- 2‚Äì3 working funnels (landing ‚Üí lead magnet ‚Üí nurture ‚Üí conversion)
- Sharp, consistent messaging across pages and campaigns
- Weekly email rhythm + automated flows
- Paid campaigns running with clear metrics
- Improved conversion on key landing pages
- A retargeting engine across LinkedIn + Meta + YouTube
- A clean, segmented CRM in HubSpot

This is a build-and-run role, not a ‚Äústrategy deck‚Äù role.

Who You Are:
- 3‚Äì4 years experience in B2B SaaS, agency, or growth
- Strong writer/editor (MUST provide samples)
- AI-native (ChatGPT, Claude, etc.)
- Comfortable in Webflow
- Comfortable navigating n8n workflows
- Solid with HubSpot (forms, lists, segmentation, email)
- Strong understanding of paid channels
- Operates with speed, clarity, and autonomy
- Thrives in early-stage, founder-led environments
- Loves taking ownership and moving fast


To Apply- please send:
1. A brief note on your approach to AI-assisted growth marketing
2. 2‚Äì3 writing samples (emails, landing pages, or campaigns)
3. A campaign you personally ran + results or learnings
4. Tools you‚Äôve used: Webflow, HubSpot, n8n, GA4, LinkedIn Ads, etc.
5. Your weekly availability + rate

jobs.title: AI Voice Swap
jobs.shortDescription:
Here are examples of my Ai generated podcasts:
https://issuemagazine.com/podcast/#/

I'm looking to take the existing audio and split it into two audio tracks (one per speaker) and then to swap out the voices with a custom voice generated from audio of human voice that will be provided. 

The idea is to create two human voices that can be applied and replace the two existing speakers. I am looking for the human voices to perfectly match the voice of the samples provided so that a listener will not know the difference. 

I would also be interested in exploring rendering AI video to match a real person of which I would also provide video footage to work from, but this would be a secondary phase.

Please let me know your level of confidence that you will be able to render the voice in a way that it's not possible to know that it was generated by AI and what you would require to create a few minutes of one the podcasts as a proof of concept. 

Also, let me know what would be required once proof of concept is approved to build a simple pipeline to easily convert one podcast after another (for all the past podcasts I have as well as future ones I am creating regularly).

Thanks!!

jobs.title: Need 30 to 35 seconds short conversational music
jobs.shortDescription:
Need an expert in AI music generation (Suno etc.) to help refine and produce a specific 35-second audio track. I have the lyrics and a rough audio concept, but I need someone to generate the perfect high-quality output that matches my specific pacing needs.

The Task:

Goal: Recreate a specific cinematic comedy trailer style track using AI tools.

Key Elements: Needs to feature two distinct male voices, fast-paced spoken dialogue (no singing), and specific musical cues (music stopping and starting abruptly).

Post-Processing: You may need to edit/splice the best AI generations together in a software to get the timing perfect (35s max limit, aim for 30 seconds).

Ideal Candidate:

sound, music expert experimenting with ai, sound editor

Capable of editing audio (cutting, speeding up sections) to fix AI pacing errors.

Understands "timing" for comedy/commercials.

Note:
I will provide the full lyrics and reference audio upon hiring.

To Apply:
Please attach some samples, specifically ones involving spoken word, comedy dialogues turn into music.

jobs.title: AI Voiceover Specialist
jobs.shortDescription:
We‚Äôre looking for a highly skilled AI Voiceover Specialist to produce high-quality, realistic American male narrations for our YouTube videos using ElevenLabs or other advanced AI voice automation tools.
JOB DETAILS:Niche: Spiritual Warfare 
Amount of voiceovers: 1
Length of scripts: 2500 words to 3500 words
Turnaround Time: 2‚Äì3 hours per project (same-day delivery)
Duration of job: Long-term (1+ year) ‚Äî we‚Äôre seeking someone consistent, reliable, and passionate about using AI to bring engaging stories to life.
JOB DESCRIPTION
Hey there! Thanks for checking out our job post. We‚Äôre searching for a professional AI voiceover expert with advanced experience using ElevenLabs or similar tools to create lifelike, emotionally believable American male narrations.
Our team manages multiple YouTube channels across a variety of niches and we‚Äôre expanding rapidly and need someone who can consistently produce natural, human-sounding voiceovers that connect with audiences and hold attention.
The tone, pacing, and delivery will evolve with each project, but here‚Äôs the general vibe we‚Äôre aiming for:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FWWwksqH9NM
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8a0jQ9s0vTY
Responsibilities
Use ElevenLabs (required) or other AI voice tools to create and refine narrations.
Adjust tone, pacing, and emotion to fit each script‚Äôs intent and style.
Ensure perfect pronunciation, especially for names, locations, and technical terms.
Export final audio as clean .mp3 or .wav files synced to script timing.
Maintain consistent voice tone and style across multiple channels.
Manage quick turnarounds (2‚Äì3 hours per project).
Stay updated on new AI voice and audio automation tools to keep improving quality.
Requirements
Proven experience using ElevenLabs (required).
Deep understanding of AI voice cloning, speech synthesis, and tone calibration.
Ability to create a believable, warm, American middle-aged male voice.
Strong ear for human pacing, emotion, and vocal dynamics.
Excellent attention to detail ‚Äî clarity and name accuracy are non-negotiable.
Reliable and communicative ‚Äî able to meet daily deadlines.
Prior experience producing YouTube-ready voiceovers preferred.
Ideal Candidate Traits
You understand storytelling flow ‚Äî when to pause, emphasize, or slow down.
You can fine-tune ElevenLabs settings to enhance warmth and realism.
You‚Äôre obsessed with creating human-sounding voices that audiences can connect with.
You take pride in clarity, professionalism, and continuous improvement.
You‚Äôre passionate about AI, YouTube, and creative storytelling.


Compensation
$5 per completed VO
Long-term opportunity with potential for performance bonuses and multi-channel expansion.
To Apply
Please include:
1. A short description of your ElevenLabs or AI voice experience.
2. A 60-second audio sample using your best American male AI voice. --I can provide a script

Thanks in advance for your interest ‚Äî we look forward to hearing your voice and working together long-term!
