jobs.title: AI Voice Agent SaaS Platform Development
jobs.shortDescription:
I'm looking for a highly skilled technical lead, you may bring 1‚Äì2 additional engineers, to build a complete AI Voice Agent SaaS platform. This is an enterprise-level product with a very large and clearly defined scope.
You MUST review the attached PDF for the full technical requirements before applying.

The platform includes every major module of a modern telephony + AI automation system, including:

Core Requirements (High-Level)

Multi-Tenant SaaS Architecture:
Isolated tenant environments, RBAC (Owner/Admin/Agent/Viewer), API key generation, Super Admin dashboard.
(Full details in the PDF ‚Äî Tenant Onboarding, Role Management, Tenant Data Isolation)

AI Voice Agents:
Real-time STT ‚Üí LLM ‚Üí TTS pipeline, AI model configuration, voice tuning, knowledge base uploads (files/URLs/text), ‚ÄúFix AI Response‚Äù simulation mode, multilingual support (English + Arabic dialects).


Telephony & Voice Engine:
Twilio/SIP integration, inbound/outbound calls, voicemail detection, AI‚ÜîHuman & AI‚ÜîAI transfers, silence/no-speech logic, sentiment detection, fallback vendor logic, real-time streaming.


Calendar & Scheduling:
Google/Outlook API integration, booking/rescheduling, time zone awareness, conflict detection.

Outbound Campaigns:
CSV/XLS batch calling, retries, scheduling, test calls.

Call History & Analytics:
Transcripts, audio player, cost breakdown, sentiment graph, performance metrics, real-time call dashboard.

Billing System:
Stripe subscription + usage-based billing, credit wallet, invoices, overage alerts.


Automation:
Zapier integration, API integrations, animated workflow builder (drag-and-drop), transfer rule editor.

Email Automation:
Gmail/Outlook/SMTP via OAuth2, templates, tracking.

WhatsApp Integration:
Two-way messaging, reminders, notifications, compliance.

Security & Compliance:
End-to-end encryption, AES-256 at rest, TLS 1.3 in transit, AWS KMS key management, GDPR-aligned handling.


Tech Stack Expected

React.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Twilio, WebRTC, Whisper, OpenAI, ElevenLabs, WhatsApp Business API, AWS.

What I Expect From You

Must have hands-on experience with Twilio Media Streams, SIP REFER, and real-time STT‚ÜíLLM‚ÜíTTS pipelines.

Proven experience delivering full SaaS platforms .

Experience with real-time telephony, STT/TTS, LLM integration, event-driven systems.

Ability to deliver structured milestones according to the scope in the PDF.

Clear communication, architectural planning, and clean code.

This project is milestone-based, fixed scope. Hourly-only applicants will be rejected.

Please answer each screening question with detailed, technical explanations. Generic or shallow answers will not be considered. Do NOT answer with ‚ÄòNDA prevents me from sharing details.‚Äô If you cannot describe your work technically, you do not qualify.

jobs.title: Vietnamese Conversation Audio Recording
jobs.shortDescription:
Hi!

We are looking for 50 pairs of Vietnamese natives with standard accent to do a conversation recording. (Please note that you need to have your own partner to do the conversation recording, and we only need the audio)

In order to develop Artificial Intelligence, we have the project that required you to do conversation recording (like a call simulation) with the maximum 6 sessions of 2 people in one group. Each session needs to be around 10-30 minutes duration and each session can not have same topic. Because this is a conversation recording, so one recording will need two persons, it will be like doing a normal conversation in a call with the topic that you can choose on the app, which are:
‚óè Movies (e.g., favorite movie, etc) 
‚óè Health (e.g., disease, hospital, doctor, etc) 
‚óè Travel Arrangements (e.g., tourist food, itinerary planning, etc) 
‚óè Game (e.g., mobile game, console game, etc)
‚óè Pet (2.g., pet daily expenses, pet medical, etc)
‚óè Education (e.g., school, exam, teacher, etc)
‚óè Sports (e.g., favorite star, favorite sport, etc)
‚óè Food (e.g., restaurant, favorite food, etc)

The rate is 25$ per valid audio hour per group, maximum is 120 minutes (2 hours) total recording duration in 6 sessions (Please note valid audio hour, not same with the recording hour. Valid audio hour is the recording that only contain speech that understandable. Silent, overlap, unintelligible speech, noise will not be count on the payment)

## Get 10$ bonus if you can complete all recording sessions within 3 days and qualified
## Get 5$ bonus if you bring friends to record completed recording and qualified

Please take a note, this one is not a voice-over project. Only a simple audio call conversation recording project that do by a group of two people with chosen topic using our client app.

Requirement:
- Have smartphone
- Have stable internet connection
- Vietnamese Native Speaker with Hanoi standard accent
- Have a quiet environment to record the conversation

Payment term:
6-8 weeks

If you meet that requirement, please submit your proposal.

Note: If you have done this project with another vendor or company, you can not join again with us

Thank you!

Note: If you have done this project with another vendor or company, you can not join again with us

Thank you!

jobs.title: AI Voice Bot Development with PBX Integration
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
We need an experienced developer to build an AI-powered Voice Bot that integrates directly with our PBX system to handle real-time phone calls with customers. The goal is to automate conversations, collect information, verify customer identity, and provide guided responses‚Äîsimilar to a call-center virtual agent.

Scope of Work

The final solution must include:

1. Voice Bot (AI Assistant)
	‚Ä¢	Natural, human-like conversation using an LLM (OpenAI, Deepgram, AssemblyAI, or similar).
	‚Ä¢	Real-time speech-to-text (STT) and text-to-speech (TTS).
	‚Ä¢	Ability to recognize intent, answer questions, and follow conversation flows.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to trigger internal actions (e.g., send data to our backend, fetch customer info, update status).

2. PBX Integration

Our PBX allows SIP/VoIP integration. The bot must be able to:
	‚Ä¢	Receive inbound calls routed from our PBX.
	‚Ä¢	Make outbound calls if needed.
	‚Ä¢	Maintain stable real-time audio streaming (WebRTC, SIP, RTP).
	‚Ä¢	Detect DTMF signals if required.
	‚Ä¢	Log call results.

3. Backend Integration

We provide a backend with customer data.
The bot must:
	‚Ä¢	Fetch customer info using API (REST/JSON).
	‚Ä¢	Update conversation status during or after the call.
	‚Ä¢	Send structured data (JSON) back to our backend.

4. Core Features Required
	‚Ä¢	Real-time bi-directional audio streaming.
	‚Ä¢	Transcription with high accuracy (Spanish Chile preferred).
	‚Ä¢	Conversation memory during the call.
	‚Ä¢	Ability to follow a defined flow (gather data ‚Üí validate ‚Üí escalate).
	‚Ä¢	Failover logic (if bot doesn‚Äôt understand, escalate to human agent).
	‚Ä¢	Call recording (optional).
	‚Ä¢	Multi-user support.

5. Additional Details
	‚Ä¢	Language: Spanish (Chile).
	‚Ä¢	Bot must be accessible via mobile and landline calls.
	‚Ä¢	High reliability, optimized for low latency.
	‚Ä¢	Must work seamlessly with the PBX routing rules.
	‚Ä¢	We will provide sample call flows and scripts.

‚∏ª

üéØ What We Will Provide
	‚Ä¢	Our PBX connection details (SIP/VoIP/WebRTC endpoint).
	‚Ä¢	Backend API endpoints.
	‚Ä¢	Example scripts and business logic.
	‚Ä¢	A test phone number for calls.

‚∏ª

üîß Preferred Technologies (Not mandatory)

Experience with any of these is a plus:
	‚Ä¢	PBX: Asterisk, FreePBX, Issabel, Genesys, Cisco, or custom SIP provider.
	‚Ä¢	AI/Voice frameworks:
	‚Ä¢	Twilio Media Streams
	‚Ä¢	Deepgram Live / Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	OpenAI Realtime API
	‚Ä¢	AssemblyAI Realtime
	‚Ä¢	VAPI.dev
	‚Ä¢	Voiceflow
	‚Ä¢	Protocols: SIP, RTP, WebRTC.
	‚Ä¢	Backend: Python/Node.js preferred.

‚∏ª

üìå Deliverables
	1.	Fully working voice bot integrated with our PBX.
	2.	API connection with our backend.
	3.	Documentation (installation + architecture).
	4.	Test cases + example calls.
	5.	Source code repo (GitHub/GitLab).

‚∏ª

üßë‚Äçüíª Required Experience
	‚Ä¢	Strong knowledge in VoIP/PBX (SIP, RTP, Asterisk, etc.)
	‚Ä¢	Experience building voice bots or conversational AI.
	‚Ä¢	Experience integrating real-time audio streaming with AI models.
	‚Ä¢	Proven record of similar past work on Upwork.

‚∏ª

‚è±Ô∏è Timeline

We expect delivery in 2‚Äì4 weeks once the project begins.

jobs.shortDescription:
ùó£ùóøùóºùó∑ùó≤ùó∞ùòÅ ùó¢ùòÉùó≤ùóøùòÉùó∂ùó≤ùòÑ:
We are looking for a developer to build an automated WhatsApp chatbot that allows users to perform mobile top-up (recharge) operations through a guided conversation.
The solution will include two main use cases:
________________________________________
ùóñùóºùóªùòÉùó≤ùóøùòÄùóÆùòÅùó∂ùóºùóªùóÆùóπ ùóôùóπùóºùòÑ (ùóúùóªùòÅùó≤ùóøùóÆùó∞ùòÅùó∂ùòÉùó≤ ùó†ùóºùó±ùó≤)
A user sends a message on WhatsApp, and the chatbot guides them through the top-up process:
1.	User initiates a conversation
2.	Chatbot asks the user to choose the mobile operator
3.	User selects the operator
4.	Chatbot asks the user to enter the client‚Äôs phone number
5.	Chatbot asks the user to choose the amount
6.	Chatbot asks to choose the offer (if applicable)
7.	User validates
8.	Chatbot calls our top-up API endpoint to execute the transaction
9.	Chatbot replies with the confirmation status
This entire flow must be fully automated and user-friendly.
________________________________________
ùó¢ùó≥ùó≥ùóπùó∂ùóªùó≤ ùó†ùóºùó±ùó≤ ‚Üí ùó™ùóµùóÆùòÅùòÄùóîùóΩùóΩ ùóñùóºùóªùòÅùó∂ùóªùòÇùóÆùòÅùó∂ùóºùóª
In this scenario, the user starts the operation inside our app (offline):
‚Ä¢	They select the operator
‚Ä¢	They enter the destination number
‚Ä¢	They choose the amount
‚Ä¢	They choose the offer
‚Ä¢	They confirm
Since the user has limited internet, they tap "Continue on WhatsApp".
On WhatsApp, the chatbot must:
1.	Receive a pre-filled code (ex: # OPERATOR # PHONE # AMOUNT # OFFER )
2.	Parse the code automatically
3.	Call our top-up API with the extracted data
4.	Return the confirmation result to the user
‚ÄÉ
- - - ùóñùóµùóÆùòÅùóØùóºùòÅ ùó≥ùó≤ùóÆùòÅùòÇùóøùó≤ùòÄ
Full automated WhatsApp conversation flow
Menu-based user choices (buttons or numbered replies)
Error handling for invalid inputs
Ability to parse structured codes sent from our app
Multilingual support (optional)

- - - ùóîùó£ùóú ùóúùóªùòÅùó≤ùó¥ùóøùóÆùòÅùó∂ùóºùóª
The chatbot must be fully connected to our backend:
POST top-up endpoint
Error/status handling (success, failure, insufficient balance, etc.)

jobs.title: Developer Needed to Wrap Excel Financial Model in Web App + Build GPT-Powered Chatbots
jobs.shortDescription:
Short Summary:

I‚Äôm building a demo ‚ÄúAI financial advisor‚Äù where Excel handles all calculations. A simple web app collects inputs through a standard form and three small chatbots that convert conversations into numeric scores. Excel then generates the plan, and a final chatbot explains the results. This is a fast, scrappy MVP meant only to showcase the concept ‚Äî not a production tool or real financial advice system.

Full Explanation: 

I‚Äôm building an MVP ‚ÄúAI financial advisor‚Äù where Excel is the single source of truth for all calculations. The web app and chatbots only collect inputs and display outputs; they should not recreate any financial logic. This is a demo proof-of-concept for a potential startup, not a production tool and not real financial planning. It just needs to work reliably enough to show the concept and guide someone through a mock plan.

Overall User Flow:

Step 1 ‚Äì Simple Web Form (like a Google Form).
The user begins on a clean web page with a standard form where they enter age, income, rent or mortgage, savings, investments, debts, and similar basic data. These values are passed directly into the Excel financial model as numeric inputs.

Step 2 ‚Äì Three Small Chatbots That Convert Conversation into Numbers.
After completing the form, the user goes through three short chatbot flows (for things like risk tolerance and other qualitative preferences). Each chatbot asks a few open-ended questions, collects a brief transcript, and sends that transcript to the OpenAI API with instructions such as: ‚ÄúBased on this conversation, assign a risk score from 1‚Äì10 and return only the number.‚Äù The API returns a single numeric value (for example, 7 for risk), and that number is passed into Excel as another input. In the end, Excel receives numeric data from two places: (1) the initial web form and (2) the three conversation-to-number chatbots.

Step 3 ‚Äì Excel Calculates the Plan.
Once all numeric inputs are ready, the user clicks ‚ÄúSee my plan‚Äù or a similar button. Excel runs its formulas and produces simple outputs such as ‚ÄúSave $250/month‚Äù and other key recommendations. The web app displays these results on a clean results page as the user‚Äôs plan.

Step 4 ‚Äì Final Explanatory Chatbot (Q&A About Their Plan).
After seeing the results, the user can talk to a generalist explanatory chatbot. For the MVP, this is simple: we bundle the user‚Äôs inputs and the Excel outputs together into a single system/context message and feed that into the OpenAI API. The chatbot then answers questions like ‚ÄúWhy do I need to save $250/month?‚Äù or ‚ÄúHow did my risk score affect this?‚Äù This chatbot does not need to write back into Excel or perform live recalculations; it just explains and reasons over the static plan snapshot.

What I Need From You:
Implement the full flow (form ‚Üí three intake chatbots ‚Üí Excel calculation ‚Üí results page ‚Üí final explanatory chatbot). Excel should remain the backend calculator unless there is an unavoidable technical issue. You should choose a simple, maintainable architecture and explain it clearly. This is a scrappy demo MVP, so shortcuts are acceptable as long as the experience works smoothly.

jobs.title: AI Automation Setup Specialist (Freelancer)
jobs.shortDescription:
Description:
I run a business helping small businesses automate repetitive admin tasks using AI and workflow automation tools. I‚Äôm looking for a freelance automation specialist to implement workflow automations based on detailed blueprints I provide.

You will NOT speak to clients ‚Äî this is purely backend implementation.

Responsibilities:
	‚Ä¢	Build automations exactly as described in my blueprint, including:
	‚Ä¢	Lead capture ‚Üí CRM ‚Üí automated follow-up
	‚Ä¢	Appointment booking + reminders
	‚Ä¢	Customer communication flows
	‚Ä¢	Invoice & payment automation
	‚Ä¢	Spreadsheet/database updates
	‚Ä¢	Dashboards and reporting (if included in blueprint)
	‚Ä¢	Test all workflows to ensure everything works end-to-end
	‚Ä¢	Document workflows in simple step-by-step instructions (SOP)
	‚Ä¢	Optionally, record short Loom walkthrough videos for internal use

Requirements:
	‚Ä¢	Experience with Zapier, Make.com, or similar workflow tools
	‚Ä¢	Understanding of AI tools (ChatGPT, document automation)
	‚Ä¢	Detail-oriented, follows instructions carefully

jobs.title: N8N Specialist Needed for Multi-Tenant RAG and Document Management
jobs.shortDescription:
Project Goal:
Develop robust N8N workflows for a multi-tenant RAG chatbot backend, handling the complete lifecycle of documents: secure upload, indexing, and crucial deletion/de-indexing. The RAG process must intelligently select documents from both a private customer repository and a shared central repository.

Required Expertise:
‚Ä¢	Essential: n8n Workflow Automation (Webhook, HTTP Request, Function/Code nodes).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) Architecture (chunking, embedding, indexing).
‚Ä¢	Essential: Advanced experience with Vector Database APIs (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant) and implementing metadata filtering for multi-tenancy and vector deletion by metadata/ID.
‚Ä¢	Strong Plus: Experience with Agentic AI systems (designing LLM calls that return structured decisions/tags).
‚Ä¢	Familiarity: Integration with major LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, etc.).

Part 1: Document Lifecycle Management Workflows (
The consultant must build two separate N8N workflows for managing document data: Ingestion and Deletion.
1a. Document Ingestion Workflow (Upload & Indexing)
‚Ä¢	Secure Upload Endpoint: Create an N8N Webhook to securely receive file uploads (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT) along with the associated customer_id and a unique document_id.
‚Ä¢	Indexing Workflow:
1.	Associate the file with the customer_id and document_id.
2.	Chunk the document content.
3.	Generate embeddings for each chunk.
4.	Store the chunks and their embeddings in the Vector Database, ensuring that both the customer_id and the document_id are included as metadata for every stored vector.
1b. Document Deletion Workflow (De-indexing)
‚Ä¢	Deletion Endpoint: Create a separate N8N Webhook to receive a request containing the customer_id and the document_id of the file to be removed.
‚Ä¢	De-indexing Workflow:
1.	Use the customer_id and document_id to make an API call to the Vector Database.
2.	Crucially, use metadata filtering to delete all vectors associated with that specific document_id and customer_id combination from the index.
3.	Send a success confirmation.

Part 2: Agentic RAG Orchestration Workflow 
This workflow handles the live querying and response generation:
1.	Receive Query Request: Triggered by a Webhook receiving the customer_id and user_query.
2.	AI Agent Decision: Send the user_query to an external AI Agent/LLM service. The Agent must analyze the request and return a structured JSON response identifying the necessary document tags.
3.	Dynamic RAG Orchestration:
o	Execute parallel HTTP Requests to the Vector Database(s).
o	Private RAG: Query the customer's dedicated data, using metadata filtering to filter by the received customer_id AND the private_tags.
o	Shared RAG: Query the central repository, filtering only by the shared_tags.
4.	Final Generation: Merge the retrieved text chunks and use the combined context to generate the final response via an LLM API call.
5.	Return Response: Respond to the original Webhook request with the final generated text.

Deliverables:
1.	A fully functional Document Ingestion N8N Workflow (JSON export).
2.	A fully functional Document Deletion N8N Workflow (JSON export) that successfully removes vectors based on document_id and customer_id.
3.	A fully functional Agentic RAG Orchestration N8N Workflow (JSON export).
4.	Detailed Documentation on workflow logic, API connections, and schema requirements.
5.	A clear demonstration that the RAG workflow only retrieves private documents linked to the correct customer_id and that deleted documents are immediately excluded from retrieval.

jobs.title: U Chat AI Assistant Developer
jobs.shortDescription:
AI Bot Builder for Dealership Demo (UChat Required)

We‚Äôre looking for an AI developer who can help us build a high-ROI demo bot for car dealerships using UChat. The goal isn‚Äôt to build a full product yet‚Äîjust a strong demo that shows all the most useful, revenue-generating features that dealerships love 

If you know how to make a bot that feels conversational, guides customers naturally, and actually produces real leads, this is for you.

What You‚Äôll Be Building

A clean demo that shows off the top features dealerships care about, including:

Smart lead generation
Conversational flow that feels human, asks the right questions, and captures name/number/email without feeling pushy.

Vehicle scenario understanding
The bot should handle buyers, trade-ins, financing questions, service requests, and vehicle availability.

Inventory search simulation
A simplified version is fine‚Äîjust enough to show the bot understands trims, budgets, body types, etc.

Trade-in mini-app
Bot can ask the basics: year, make, model, mileage, condition ‚Üí then offer a rough estimate or ‚Äúwe‚Äôll review it.‚Äù

Finance/payment conversation
Simple ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs your budget?‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúHere‚Äôs what you can expect monthly.‚Äù Doesn‚Äôt need a full calculator, just logic.

Appointment scheduling
Test drive or service booking flow that ends in a solid lead.

Lead routing
Send leads to email or webhook so we can show it connects to CRMs.

Basically: a simple but powerful dealership sales assistant that shows the best stuff quickly.

What We Need From You

Strong experience building conversational flows in UChat

Ability to make the bot feel natural, not scripted

Understanding of dealership sales flow is a big plus( we can assist in this)

Can build clean logic for different customer types (buyer, trade-in, service)

Able to work fast and produce a smooth demo experience


About the Project

This is demo-first ‚Äî not a full SaaS platform yet

Focus on impressing dealers with the high-ROI features

Should run on website, web chat(facebook, instagram) but SMS/Messenger experience is a bonus

Short-term contract with potential for longer-term work

How to Apply

Send:

Any UChat bots you‚Äôve built

Your experience with dealership or sales bots (if any)

 How long you think the demo will take

jobs.title: AI Prompt & Workflow Specialist for Zendesk + Eesel AI (with basic API knowledge)
jobs.shortDescription:
We are Brouwland, Europe¬¥s leading wholesaler for all your craft brewing, wine making or artisan food needs.
We are currently setting up AI-driven workflows in Zendesk using Eesel AI and are looking for a hands-on freelancer to support us with prompt creation, scenario mapping, and automation setup.

What You‚Äôll Work On:
- Collaborate with our Customer Service and PMO teams to map and define all standard customer scenarios, and translate them into structured Eesel AI prompts.
- Build, refine, and test AI prompts and workflows inside Eesel AI.
- Create and maintain fallback and error-handling logic.
- Later in the project: develop custom actions in Eesel AI to fetch data from our SAP system (and other tools) via API calls.
- Ensure proper integration and validation of all flows inside Zendesk.

We‚Äôre looking for someone who is:
- Strong in prompt writing and logical thinking.
- Accurate, structured and detail-oriented.
- Experienced with AI chatflows, automation tools, or no-code workflow builders.
- Comfortable with the basics of API requests (GET/POST, headers, parameters).

Nice-to-haves:
- Zendesk experience
- Eesel AI experience
- Customer service workflow knowledge
- Experience with SAP Business One integrations

Project Timeline:
- Start: ASAP
- Duration: A few weeks for the basics, with additional phases afterwards
- Collaboration: Ongoing and iterative

Why You‚Äôll Enjoy This Project:
- You collaborate directly with a motivated team applying AI in smart, practical ways.
- The prompts and workflows you build will have immediate impact for our company and our customers.
- You‚Äôll have room to contribute ideas and help shape the structure of our AI solution.

jobs.title: Brand Voice GPT Development and Training

This includes:

Creating the full brand-voice framework (tone, personality, structure, examples, do/don‚Äôt rules) in a format optimized for GPT performance

Collecting and organizing voice samples from our existing materials (organic social, printed assets, YouTube content, emails, press releases, etc.)

The project will focus on integrating an AI caller and WhatsApp API, as well as developing an AI avatar for user interaction. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in API integrations and AI implementation. If you are passionate about cutting-edge technology and can deliver high-quality work, we would love to hear from you.

jobs.shortDescription: I‚Äôm looking for an experienced developer to connect an outbound voice bot between Go High Level (GHL) and VAPI. The task requires setting up a VAPI endpoint that accepts API requests from GHL, triggers outbound calls, processes different call outcomes, and returns the results back to GHL.

jobs.title: Freelance AI Chatbot Developer for Website & Airbnb Automation
jobs.shortDescription:
We are looking for an experienced and highly skilled AI Chatbot Developer to design, build, and deploy a custom, intelligent chatbot solution. This bot will be integrated into our main website and our Airbnb listings to provide 24/7 customer support, pre-booking information, and guest management automation.

The ideal candidate has a strong background in conversational AI, NLP, and API integrations, specifically with experience in hospitality or e-commerce environments.

üéØ Project Scope & Deliverables
The goal is to create a seamless, human-like conversational experience that significantly reduces manual guest communication time while improving user satisfaction.

Core Chatbot Development: Develop a robust, custom AI chatbot capable of natural language understanding (NLU) and generation.

Website Integration: Seamlessly embed the chatbot on our main business website for general inquiries and lead generation.

Airbnb Integration: Integrate the chatbot with our Airbnb management system/inbox (or a third-party platform that connects to Airbnb) to automate guest communication.

Information Training & Knowledge Base: Train the bot using our specific data, including property details, FAQs, house rules, local recommendations, and website service information.

‚ú® Key Chatbot Features Required
24/7 Instant Response: Handle common guest and customer questions immediately (e.g., check-in/out times, Wi-Fi passwords, address, booking process).

Contextual Q&A: Provide accurate, relevant answers based on the specific Airbnb listing or website page the user is viewing.

Multilingual Support: Communicate effectively with international guests in multiple languages (e.g., English, Spanish, French).

Booking/Availability Inquiry: Answer questions about property availability, specific dates, and pricing (requires integration/API access with a booking system or calendar).

Escalation/Handoff: Implement a clear path for complex or urgent questions to be routed to a human team member (email/SMS notification).

Sentiment Analysis: Identify urgent or negative guest sentiments to prioritize human intervention.

Custom Branding: The bot's interface and tone should align with our brand identity.

üõ†Ô∏è Skills & Experience We're Looking For
Expertise in AI/ML: Strong command of Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Learning models.

Chatbot Frameworks: Experience with platforms like Rasa, Dialogflow, Microsoft Bot Framework, or a leading LLM API (e.g., OpenAI/GPT, Google Gemini, Anthropic).

Programming Languages: Proficiency in Python (for ML/NLP) and/or JavaScript/Node.js (for web integration).

API & Backend Integration: Proven ability to integrate chatbots with third-party systems, databases, and potentially Property Management Systems (PMS) or Airbnb's API/messaging tools.

Conversational UX Design: Ability to design intuitive and efficient conversation flows.

Prior Hospitality/Airbnb Experience is a significant plus.

üìÖ Project Duration & Budget
Duration: Please provide an estimated timeline for development, testing, and deployment (e.g., 4-8 weeks).

Budget: This is a [Fixed-Price / Hourly] project. Please submit your best fixed-price quote for the full scope, or your competitive hourly rate.

‚ùì How to Apply
Please include the following in your proposal:

A brief summary of your relevant experience developing and deploying AI chatbots.

Examples or a link to your portfolio showcasing a live or past chatbot project, especially in e-commerce or hospitality.

Your proposed technical stack (e.g., "Rasa deployed on AWS" or "Custom LLM using Python and a vector database").

Your estimated project timeline and cost.

We are excited to find a developer who can bring this project to life and dramatically improve our operational efficiency and guest experience!

jobs.title: Open Talent Bench (AI, Automation, Workflows, Systems)
jobs.shortDescription:
Remote ‚Ä¢ Project-Based ‚Ä¢ Flexible ‚Ä¢ Bring Your Skillset

ShiftWorks is building a bench of highly skilled contractors to support our growing pipeline of AI & workflow consulting projects. We specialize in helping small‚Äìmid sized businesses work smarter, automate repetitive tasks, and level up their internal operations using AI, automation, and smart systems design.

We‚Äôre looking for exceptional operators, builders, and problem-solvers with any skill that could meaningfully contribute to modernizing how companies work.
If you‚Äôre talented and have a skillset that helps teams save time, reduce manual work, or operate more efficiently ‚Äî we want to meet you.

This is a general application for freelancers who want to be considered for upcoming client projects.

üîé We‚Äôre especially interested in people with skills in:

AI + Automation
- Make.com, Zapier, n8n, Airtable automation
- LLM prompt engineering
- Workflow automation builds
- API integrations
- AI chatbot design
- System architecture for AI-powered processes

Workflow & Operations
- Process mapping (Miro/FigJam/Lucidchart)
- Business process improvement
- SOP writing
- Operations consulting
- Systems documentation
- QA testing of workflows
- Data cleanup / system migrations

No-Code & Tools
- Airtable / Notion / Coda builders
- Bubble / Softr / Glide / Retool app builders
- CRM setups (HubSpot, Zoho, Pipedrive)
- Specialized Expertise
- Industry-specific workflow knowledge (logistics, finance, real estate, legal, healthcare admin, etc.)
- Any skill that meaningfully improves internal operations
- Any experience turning chaos into clean, efficient systems
- If you build things that make work faster, cleaner, or smarter ‚Äî we want you.

üéØ What We Offer
- Project-based work (you choose when you take on projects)
- Clear scopes and smooth handoffs
- A growing pipeline of SMB clients
- Opportunities for ongoing work as we scale
- Fair, transparent compensation based on project scope
- A chance to shape and influence ShiftWorks‚Äô early product offerings
- This is a flexible contractor relationship ‚Äî no minimum hours required.

üß© Who Thrives With Us
- People who think in systems
- Operators who can jump into messy workflows and bring order
- AI builders who want real business use-cases
- Consultants who enjoy project-based, high-impact work
- Problem-solvers who love finding efficiency gaps
- Individuals who can communicate clearly and deliver reliably
If you‚Äôre the kind of person who sees a broken process and instinctively wants to fix it, you‚Äôll fit in here.

üì¨ How to Apply
Please send us:
- A quick intro about you 
- The core skill(s) you offer
- Examples of past work (links, docs, screenshots, Looms, etc.)
- Your typical availability and project-based rates
- Anything else that shows us how you think or what you build

jobs.title: Help Needed: Retell AI Call Summary Debug + Fix (24-Hour Deadline)
jobs.shortDescription:
Title:
Retell AI Expert Needed to Fix New-Patient Call Summary Data Capture (24-Hour Completion)

Job Description:
I am seeking an experienced Retell AI specialist to urgently troubleshoot and fix a data-capture issue within my voice agent‚Äôs call summaries. The current agent is NOT populating patient name and other key new-caller fields into the call summary payload. This data must be reliably captured and pushed into my Make.com workflow.

My goal: When a new patient calls, the AI must collect and export all defined fields (name, phone, referral source, appointment need, insurance status, and other attributes) to my webhook summary successfully and consistently.
I need someone who fully understands Retell AI prompt optimization, variable handling, webhook data mapping, and structured data extraction from live phone calls.

Required Deliverables
‚úî Diagnose why the following fields are not populating consistently:
Patient full name
Phone number
Referral source
Appointment reason / dental needs
Insurance status

Billing inquiry classification (if applicable)
‚úî Verify that all fields currently defined in the call flow and schema are captured correctly and passed to the summary webhook payload
‚úî Modify and/or rebuild the Retell AI prompt, variables, or JSON schema as needed
‚úî Confirm proper data transfer from Retell AI ‚Üí Make.com webhook
‚úî Confirm test call summaries populate correctly via multiple call simulations
‚úî Provide brief documentation of:
what was wrong
how it was fixed
recommendations to prevent future failures

Technical Requirements
Experience with all of the following is REQUIRED:
Retell AI call agent setup, variable mapping, and prompt engineering
Data capture for structured call outputs
Webhook formatting & JSON payload troubleshooting
Make.com HTTP/webhook integrations
Designing question/response flows that guarantee patient name capture

BONUS experience:
Healthcare or dental call-flow logic
Prompt-based lead intake design
Production-grade QA testing for call agents

Expected Outcome
üìå When a patient calls, I should receive a fully structured summary with complete, accurate data in my webhook, including:
Full name (always captured)
Phone
Appointment type or purpose
Insurance/billing status
Referral source
Notes requiring team follow-up
üìå All summary fields should be consistently populated without gaps
üìå System must be production-ready for live patient phone use

Deadline
Final completion required within 24 hours of contract acceptance.
Functional test calls confirming full data capture are mandatory before final payment.

What I Will Provide
Access to agent prompt
Existing JSON schema
Screenshot examples of missing summary values
Make.com webhook endpoint
Specific questions and fields required for the call flow

Success Criteria
100% successful summary population on at least 3 test calls
No missing name fields
No empty data variables
Cleanly formatted JSON output for Make.com

To Apply
Please reply with:
Your Retell AI experience
1‚Äì2 similar call-intake automations you‚Äôve built
Your proposed plan and confidence level
Confirmation you can deliver within 24 hours
Immediate hire for the right candidate.
